flashcards.question: What are Aatrox's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Deathbringer Stance
Periodically, Aatrox's next basic attack deals bonus <physicalDamage>physical damage</physicalDamage> and heals him, based on the target's max health. 

Q: The Darkin Blade
Cooldown: 14/12/10/8/6
Aatrox slams his greatsword down, dealing physical damage. He can swing three times, each with a different area of effect.

W: Infernal Chains
Cooldown: 26/23/20/17/14
Aatrox smashes the ground, dealing damage to the first enemy hit. Champions and large monsters have to leave the impact area quickly or they will be dragged to the center and take the damage again.

E: Umbral Dash
Cooldown: 9/8/7/6/5
Passively, Aatrox heals when damaging enemy champions. On activation, he dashes in a direction.

R: World Ender
Cooldown: 120/100/80
Aatrox unleashes his demonic form, fearing nearby enemy minions and gaining attack damage, increased healing, and movement speed. If he gets a takedown, this effect is extended.

flashcards.question: What are Ahri's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Essence Theft
When Ahri strikes 9 enemies with her abilities, her next ability also heals her for each enemy hit.

Q: Orb of Deception
Cooldown: 7
Ahri sends out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back. 

W: Fox-Fire
Cooldown: 9/8/7/6/5
Ahri gains a brief burst of movement speed and releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.

E: Charm
Cooldown: 12
Ahri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, instantly stopping movement abilities and causing them to walk harmlessly towards her. The target temporarily takes increased damage from Ahri.

R: Spirit Rush
Cooldown: 130/105/80
Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging nearby enemies. Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown.

flashcards.question: What are Akali's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Assassin's Mark
Dealing spell damage to a champion creates a ring of energy around them. Exiting that ring empowers Akali's next autoattack with bonus range and damage.

Q: Five Point Strike
Cooldown: 1.5
Akali throws out five kunai, dealing damage based on her bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power and slowing.

W: Twilight Shroud
Cooldown: 20
Akali drops a cover of smoke and briefly gains Movement Speed. While inside the shroud, Akali becomes invisible and unable to be selected by enemy spells and attacks. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her.  

E: Shuriken Flip
Cooldown: 16/14.5/13/11.5/10
Flip backward and fire a shuriken forward, dealing magic damage. The first enemy or smoke cloud hit is marked. Re-cast to dash to the marked target, dealing additional damage.

R: Perfect Execution
Cooldown: 100/80/60
Akali leaps in a direction, damaging enemies she strikes. Re-cast: Akali dashes in a direction, executing all enemies she strikes.

flashcards.question: What are Alistar's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Triumphant Roar
Alistar charges his roar by stunning or displacing enemy champions or when nearby enemies die. When fully charged he heals himself all nearby allied champions.

Q: Pulverize
Cooldown: 15/14/13/12/11
Alistar smashes the ground, dealing damage to nearby enemies and tossing them into the air.

W: Headbutt
Cooldown: 14/13/12/11/10
Alistar rams a target with his head, dealing damage and knocking the target back.

E: Trample
Cooldown: 12/11.5/11/10.5/10
Alistar tramples nearby enemy units, ignoring unit collision and gaining stacks if he damages an enemy champion. At full stacks Alistar's next basic attack against an enemy champion deals additional magic damage and stuns them.

R: Unbreakable Will
Cooldown: 120/100/80
Alistar lets out a wild roar, removing all crowd control effects on himself, and reducing incoming physical and magical damage for the duration.

flashcards.question: What are Amumu's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Cursed Touch
Amumu's basic attacks <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curse</font> his enemies, causing them to take bonus true damage from incoming magic damage.

Q: Bandage Toss
Cooldown: 10/9.5/9/8.5/8
Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.

W: Despair
Cooldown: 1
Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second and have their <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curses</font> refreshed.

E: Tantrum
Cooldown: 10/9/8/7/6
Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.

R: Curse of the Sad Mummy
Cooldown: 150/125/100
Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, applying his <keywordMajor>Curse</keywordMajor>, damaging and stunning them.

flashcards.question: What are Anivia's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Rebirth
Upon taking fatal damage, Anivia reverts to an egg and is reborn with full health.

Q: Flash Frost
Cooldown: 11/10/9/8/7
Anivia brings her wings together and summons a sphere of ice that flies towards her opponents, chilling and damaging anyone in its path. When the sphere explodes it does moderate damage in a radius, stunning anyone in the area.

W: Crystallize
Cooldown: 17
Anivia condenses the moisture in the air into an impassable wall of ice to block all movement. The wall only lasts a short duration before it melts.

E: Frostbite
Cooldown: 4
With a flap of her wings, Anivia blasts a freezing gust of wind at her target, dealing damage. If the target was recently hit by Flash Frost or damaged by a fully formed Glacial Storm, the damage they take is doubled.

R: Glacial Storm
Cooldown: 4/3/2
Anivia summons a driving rain of ice and hail to damage her enemies and slow their advance.

flashcards.question: What are Annie's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Pyromania
After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target.

Q: Disintegrate
Cooldown: 4
Annie hurls a Mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target.

W: Incinerate
Cooldown: 8
Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.

E: Molten Shield
Cooldown: 14/13/12/11/10
Grants Annie or an ally a shield, a burst of Movement Speed, and damages enemies who attack her with basic attacks.

R: Summon: Tibbers
Cooldown: 120/100/80
Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.

flashcards.question: What are Aphelios's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: The Hitman and the Seer Aphelios wields 5 Lunari Weapons made by his sister Alune. He has access to two at a time: one main-hand and one off-hand. Each weapon has a unique Basic Attack and Activated Ability. Attacks and abilities consume a weapon's ammo. When out of ammo, Aphelios discards the weapon and Alune summons the next of the 5. Q: Weapon Abilites Cooldown: 9 Aphelios has 5 different activated abilities, based on his main-hand weapon:

Calibrum (Rifle): Long range shot that marks its target for a long-range follow-up attack.
Severum (Scythe Pistol): Run fast while attacking nearby enemies with both weapons.
Gravitum (Cannon): Root all enemies slowed by this weapon.
Infernum (Flamethrower): Blast enemies in a cone and attack them with your off-hand weapon.
Crescendum (Chakram): Deploy a sentry that shoots your off-hand weapon.
W: Phase Cooldown: 0.8 Aphelios swaps his main-hand gun with his off-hand gun, replacing his basic attack and activated ability. E: Weapon Queue System Cooldown: 0 Aphelios has no third ability. This slot shows the next weapon Alune will give him. Weapon order begins fixed but may change over game time -- when a weapon is out of ammo it goes to the end of the order. R: Moonlight Vigil Cooldown: 120/110/100 Fire a concentrated blast of moonlight that explodes on enemy champions. Applies the unique effect of Aphelios' main-hand gun.

flashcards.question: What are Ashe's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Frost Shot Ashe's attacks slow their target, causing her to deal increased damage to these targets.

Ashe's critical strikes deal no bonus damage but apply an empowered slow to the target. Q: Ranger's Focus Cooldown: 0 Ashe builds up Focus by attacking. At maximum Focus, Ashe can cast Ranger's Focus to consume all stacks of Focus, temporarily increasing her Attack Speed and transforming her basic attack into a powerful flurry attack for the duration. W: Volley Cooldown: 14/11.5/9/6.5/4 Ashe fires arrows in a cone for increased damage. Also applies Frost Shot. E: Hawkshot Cooldown: 5 Ashe sends her Hawk Spirit on a scouting mission anywhere on the map. R: Enchanted Crystal Arrow Cooldown: 100/90/80 Ashe fires a missile of ice in a straight line. If the arrow collides with an enemy Champion, it deals damage and stuns the Champion, stunning for longer the farther arrow has traveled. In addition, surrounding enemy units take damage and are slowed.

flashcards.question: What are Aurelion Sol's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Center of the Universe
Stars orbit Aurelion Sol, dealing magic damage when they hit an enemy.

Q: Starsurge
Cooldown: 11/10/9/8/7
Aurelion Sol creates an expanding disk, which explodes to stun and damage enemies when it moves too far away from him.

W: Celestial Expansion
Cooldown: 8/6.5/5/3.5/2
Aurelion Sol pushes his stars farther out, increasing their damage and speed.

E: Comet of Legend
Cooldown: 80/75/70/65/60
Aurelion Sol takes off flying for a long distance.

R: Voice of Light
Cooldown: 110/90/70
Aurelion Sol projects a blast of pure starfire, damaging and slowing all enemies caught in it and knocking nearby enemies back to a safer distance.

flashcards.question: What are Azir's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Shurima's Legacy
Azir can summon the Disc of the Sun from the ruins of allied or enemy turrets.

Q: Conquering Sands
Cooldown: 14/12/10/8/6
Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a slow for 1 second.

W: Arise!
Cooldown: 1.5
Azir summons a Sand Soldier to attack nearby targets for him, replacing his basic attack against targets within the soldier's range. Their attacks deal magic damage to enemies in a line. Arise! also passively grants attack speed to Azir and his Sand Soldiers.

E: Shifting Sands
Cooldown: 19/18/17/16/15
Azir shields himself briefly and dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies. If he hits an enemy champion, he instantly readies a new Sand Soldier for deployment and halts his dash.

R: Emperor's Divide
Cooldown: 120/105/90
Azir summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward, knocking back and damaging enemies.

flashcards.question: What are Bard's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Traveler's Call Meeps: Bard attracts lesser spirits that assist with his basic attacks to deal extra magic damage. When Bard has collected enough Chimes, his meeps will also deal damage in an area and slow enemies hit.

Chimes: Ancient chimes randomly appear for Bard to collect. These grant experience, maximum mana, and out-of-combat movement speed stacks.
Q: Cosmic Binding Cooldown: 11/10/9/8/7 Bard fires a missile which will slow the first enemy struck, and continue onward. If it strikes a wall, it will stun the initial target; if it strikes another enemy, it will stun them both. W: Caretaker's Shrine Cooldown: 14 Reveals a healing shrine which powers up over a short time, disappearing after healing and speeding up the first ally that touches it. E: Magical Journey Cooldown: 22/20.5/19/17.5/16 Bard opens a portal in nearby terrain. Allies and enemies alike can take a one-way trip through that terrain by moving into the portal. R: Tempered Fate Cooldown: 110/95/80 Bard sends spirit energy arcing to a location, putting all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets hit into stasis for a brief time.

flashcards.question: What are Blitzcrank's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Mana Barrier
Blitzcrank gains a shield based on his mana when dropping to low health.

Q: Rocket Grab
Cooldown: 20/19/18/17/16
Blitzcrank fires his right hand to grab an opponent on its path, dealing damage and dragging it back to him.

W: Overdrive
Cooldown: 15
Blitzcrank super charges himself to get dramatically increased Movement and Attack Speed. He is temporarily slowed after the effect ends.

E: Power Fist
Cooldown: 9/8/7/6/5
Blitzcrank charges up his fist to make his next attack deal double damage and pop his target up in the air.

R: Static Field
Cooldown: 60/40/20
Enemies attacked by Blitzcrank are marked and take lightning damage after 1 second. Additionally, Blitzcrank can activate this ability to remove nearby enemies' shields, damage them, and silence them briefly.

flashcards.question: What are Brand's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Blaze
Brand's spells light his targets ablaze, dealing damage over 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. If Brand kills an enemy while it is ablaze he regains mana. When Blaze reaches max stacks on a Champion, siege minion, or large monster, it becomes unstable. It detonates in 2 seconds, applying spell effects and dealing massive damage in an area around the victim.

Q: Sear
Cooldown: 8/7.5/7/6.5/6
Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target for 1.5 seconds.

W: Pillar of Flame
Cooldown: 10/9.5/9/8.5/8
After a short delay, Brand creates a Pillar of Flame at a target area, dealing magic damage to enemy units within the area. Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage.

E: Conflagration
Cooldown: 12/11/10/9/8
Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target that spreads to nearby enemies, dealing magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Conflagration's spread is doubled.

R: Pyroclasm
Cooldown: 105/90/75
Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire that bounces up to 5 times off of Brand and nearby enemies, dealing magic damage to enemies each time bounce. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on Champions. If a target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will briefly slow them.

flashcards.question: What are Braum's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Concussive Blows Braum's basic attacks apply Concussive Blows. Once the first stack is applied, ally basic attacks also stack Concussive Blows.

Upon reaching 4 stacks, the target is stunned and takes magic damage. For the next few seconds they cannot receive new stacks, but take bonus magic damage from Braum's attacks. Q: Winter's Bite Cooldown: 10/9/8/7/6 Braum propels freezing ice from his shield, slowing and dealing magic damage.

Applies a stack of Concussive Blows. W: Stand Behind Me Cooldown: 12/11/10/9/8 Braum leaps to a target allied champion or minion. On arrival, Braum and the ally gain Armor and Magic Resist for a few seconds. E: Unbreakable Cooldown: 18/16/14/12/10 Braum raises his shield in a direction for several seconds, intercepting all projectiles causing them to hit him and be destroyed. He negates the damage of the first attack completely and reduces the damage of all subsequent attacks from this direction. R: Glacial Fissure Cooldown: 120/100/80 Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line that slows enemies.

flashcards.question: What are Caitlyn's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Headshot
Every few basic attacks, or against a target she has trapped or netted, Caitlyn will fire a headshot dealing bonus damage that scales with her critical strike chance. On trapped or netted targets, Caitlyn's Headshot attack range is doubled.

Q: Piltover Peacemaker
Cooldown: 10/9/8/7/6
Caitlyn revs up her rifle for 1 second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets).

W: Yordle Snap Trap
Cooldown: 0.5
Caitlyn sets a trap to find sneaky yordles. When sprung, the trap reveals and immobilizes the enemy champion for 1.5 seconds, granting Caitlyn an empowered Headshot.

E: 90 Caliber Net
Cooldown: 16/14.5/13/11.5/10
Caitlyn fires a heavy net to slow her target. The recoil knocks Caitlyn back.

R: Ace in the Hole
Cooldown: 90/75/60
Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally.

flashcards.question: What are Camille's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Adaptive Defenses
Basic attacks on champions grant a shield equal to a percentage of Camille's maximum health against their damage type (Physical or Magic) for a brief duration.

Q: Precision Protocol
Cooldown: 9/8.25/7.5/6.75/6
Camille's next attack deals bonus damage and grants bonus movement speed. This spell can be recast for a short period of time, doing significantly increased bonus damage if Camille delays a period of time between the two attacks.

W: Tactical Sweep
Cooldown: 17/15.5/14/12.5/11
Camille blasts in a cone after a delay, dealing damage. Enemies in the outer half are slowed and take extra damage, while also healing Camille.

E: Hookshot
Cooldown: 16/14.5/13/11.5/10
Camille pulls herself to a wall, leaping off and knocking up enemy champions upon landing.

R: The Hextech Ultimatum
Cooldown: 140/115/90
Camille dashes to target champion, anchoring them to the area. She also deals bonus magic damage to the target with her basic attacks.

flashcards.question: What are Cassiopeia's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Serpentine Grace
Cassiopeia gains Movement Speed per level, but she cannot purchase Boots items.

Q: Noxious Blast
Cooldown: 3.5
Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Movement Speed if she hits an enemy champion.

W: Miasma
Cooldown: 24/22/20/18/16
Cassiopeia releases several clouds of poison, slowing, grounding, and lightly damaging enemies that pass through them. Grounded enemies cannot use Movement abilities.

E: Twin Fang
Cooldown: 0.75
Cassiopeia lets loose an attack that deals increased damage to Poisoned targets and heals her for a percentage of the damage dealt. If the target dies from this attack, Cassiopeia regains Mana.

R: Petrifying Gaze
Cooldown: 120/100/80
Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.

flashcards.question: What are Cho'Gath's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Carnivore
Whenever Cho'Gath kills a unit, he recovers Health and Mana. The values restored increase with Cho'Gath's level.

Q: Rupture
Cooldown: 7
Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.

W: Feral Scream
Cooldown: 13/12/11/10/9
Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.

E: Vorpal Spikes
Cooldown: 8/7/6/5/4
Cho'Gath's attacks release deadly spikes, dealing damage and slowing all enemy units in front of him.

R: Feast
Cooldown: 80
Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health.

flashcards.question: What are Corki's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Hextech Munitions A percentage of Corki's basic attack damage is converted into magic damage.

Corki can occasionally retrieve The Package inside his base, granting him movement speed and an empowered cast of Valkyrie. Q: Phosphorus Bomb Cooldown: 8 Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration. W: Valkyrie Cooldown: 20/19/18/17/16 Corki flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it. E: Gatling Gun Cooldown: 16 Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and reducing enemy Armor and Magic Resist. R: Missile Barrage Cooldown: 2 Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a Big One, dealing extra damage.

flashcards.question: What are Darius's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Hemorrhage
Darius's attacks and damaging abilities cause enemies to bleed for physical damage over 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

Q: Decimate
Cooldown: 9/8/7/6/5
Darius winds up and swings his axe in a wide circle. Enemies struck by the blade take more damage than those struck by the handle. Darius heals based on enemy champions and large monsters hit by the blade.

W: Crippling Strike
Cooldown: 7/6.5/6/5.5/5
Darius's next attack strikes an enemy's crucial artery. As they bleed out, their Movement Speed is slowed.

E: Apprehend
Cooldown: 24/21/18/15/12
Darius hones his axe, passively causing his physical damage to ignore a percentage of his target's Armor. When activated, Darius sweeps up his enemies with his axe's hook and pulls them to him.

R: Noxian Guillotine
Cooldown: 120/100/80
Darius leaps to an enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing true damage. This damage is increased for each stack of Hemorrhage on the target. If Noxian Guillotine is a killing blow, its cooldown is refreshed for a brief duration.

flashcards.question: What are Diana's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Moonsilver Blade Every third strike cleaves nearby enemies for an additional magic damage. After casting a spell, Diana gains attack speed for her next 3 attacks. Q: Crescent Strike Cooldown: 8/7.5/7/6.5/6 Unleashes a bolt of lunar energy in an arc dealing magic damage.

Afflicts enemies struck with Moonlight, revealing them if they are not stealthed for 3 seconds. W: Pale Cascade Cooldown: 15/13.5/12/10.5/9 Diana creates three orbiting spheres that detonate on contact with enemies to deal damage in an area. She also gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. If her third sphere detonates, the shield gains additional strength. E: Lunar Rush Cooldown: 22/20/18/16/14 Becomes the living embodiment of the vengeful moon, dashing to an enemy and dealing magic damage.

Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to dash to an enemy afflicted with Moonlight. All other enemies will have the Moonlight debuff removed regardless of whether they were the target of Lunar Rush. R: Moonfall Cooldown: 100/90/80 Diana reveals and draws in all nearby enemies and slows them.

If Diana pulls in one or more enemy champions, the moonlight crashes down onto her after a short delay, dealing magic damage in an area around her, increased for each target beyond the first pulled.

flashcards.question: What are Draven's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: League of Draven
Draven gains his fans' Adoration when he catches a Spinning Axe or kills a minion, monster, or tower. Killing enemy champions grants Draven bonus gold based on how much Adoration he has.

Q: Spinning Axe
Cooldown: 12/11/10/9/8
Draven's next attack will deal bonus physical damage. This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe. Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.

W: Blood Rush
Cooldown: 12
Draven gains increased Movement Speed and Attack Speed. The Movement Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration. Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.

E: Stand Aside
Cooldown: 18/17/16/15/14
Draven throws his axes, dealing physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed.

R: Whirling Death
Cooldown: 100/90/80
Draven hurls two massive axes to deal physical damage to each unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals less damage for each unit hit and resets when the axes reverse direction.

flashcards.question: What are Dr. Mundo's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Adrenaline Rush
Dr. Mundo regenerates 0.3% of his maximum Health each second.

Q: Infected Cleaver
Cooldown: 4
Dr. Mundo hurls his cleaver, dealing damage equal to a portion of his target's current Health and slowing them for a short time. Dr. Mundo delights in the suffering of others, so he is returned a portion of the Health cost when he successfully lands a cleaver (doubled on killing blows).

W: Burning Agony
Cooldown: 4
Dr. Mundo drains his Health to reduce the duration of disables and deal continual damage to nearby enemies.

E: Masochism
Cooldown: 6/5.5/5/4.5/4
Dr. Mundo gains bonus attack damage based on his missing health, and his next basic attack headbutts his target for additional damage. Passively increases magic resist whenever Dr. Mundo is dealt magic damage or pays a health cost.

R: Sadism
Cooldown: 110/100/90
Dr. Mundo sacrifices a portion of his Health for increased Movement Speed and drastically increased Health Regeneration.

flashcards.question: What are Ekko's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Z-Drive Resonance Every third attack or damaging spell on the same target deals bonus magic damage, and grants Ekko a burst of speed if the target is a champion.

Q: Timewinder Cooldown: 9/8.5/8/7.5/7 Ekko throws a temporal grenade that expands into a time-distortion field upon hitting an enemy champion, slowing and damaging anyone caught inside. After a delay, the grenade rewinds back to Ekko, dealing damage on its return. W: Parallel Convergence Cooldown: 22/20/18/16/14 Ekko's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage to low health enemies. He can cast Parallel Convergence to split the timeline, creating an anomaly after a few seconds that slows enemies caught inside. If Ekko enters the anomaly, he gains shielding and stuns enemies by suspending them in time. E: Phase Dive Cooldown: 9/8.5/8/7.5/7 Ekko rolls evasively while charging up his Z-Drive. His next attack deals bonus damage and warps reality, teleporting him to his target. R: Chronobreak Cooldown: 110/80/50 Ekko shatters his timeline, becoming untargetable and rewinding to a more favorable point in time. He returns to whenever he was a few seconds ago, and heals for a percentage of the damage received in that duration. Enemies near his arrival zone take massive damage.

flashcards.question: What are Elise's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Spider Queen Human Form: When Elise's abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant Spiderling.

Spider Form: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and restore health to Elise. Q: Neurotoxin / Venomous Bite Cooldown: 6 Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.

Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is. W: Volatile Spiderling / Skittering Frenzy Cooldown: 12 Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain Attack Speed. E: Cocoon / Rappel Cooldown: 12/11.5/11/10.5/10 Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy. After descending on an enemy target, Elise's bonus damage and healing from Spider Queen is increased. R: Spider Form Cooldown: 4 Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for movement speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes.

flashcards.question: What are Evelynn's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Demon Shade
When out of combat, Evelynn enters Demon Shade. Demon Shade heals Evelynn when she is low on health and grants Camouflage after level 6.

Q: Hate Spike
Cooldown: 4
Evelynn strikes out with her Lasher, dealing damage to the first unit hit. Then, Evelynn can shoot a line of spikes at nearby foes up to 3 times.

W: Allure
Cooldown: 15/14/13/12/11
Evelynn curses her target, causing her next attack or spell after a delay to charm her target and reduce their magic resist.

E: Whiplash
Cooldown: 8
Evelynn whips her target with her Lasher, dealing damage. She then gains movement speed for a short duration.

R: Last Caress
Cooldown: 140/110/80
Evelynn briefly goes untargetable and decimates the area in front of her before warping backwards a long distance.

flashcards.question: What are Ezreal's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Rising Spell Force
Ezreal gains increasing Attack Speed each time he successfully hits a spell, stacking up to 5 times.

Q: Mystic Shot
Cooldown: 5.5/5.25/5/4.75/4.5
Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns slightly if it strikes an enemy unit.

W: Essence Flux
Cooldown: 12
Ezreal fires an orb that sticks to the first champion or objective hit. If Ezreal hits an enemy with the orb, it detonates and deals damage.

E: Arcane Shift
Cooldown: 28/25/22/19/16
Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit. Prioritizes enemies stuck with Essence Flux.

R: Trueshot Barrage
Cooldown: 120
Ezreal winds up before firing a powerful barrage of energy that deals massive damage to each unit it passes through (damage is reduced for minions and non-epic monsters).

flashcards.question: What are Fiddlesticks's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: A Harmless Scarecrow
Fiddlesticks' trinket is replaced by scarecrow effigies.

Q: Terrify
Cooldown: 15/14.5/14/13.5/13
Fiddlesticks damaging enemies with spells while unseen or targeting an enemy with Terrify's activation strikes a target unit with fear, causing it to flee in terror for a duration.

W: Bountiful Harvest
Cooldown: 10/9.5/9/8.5/8
Fiddlesticks drains health from nearby enemies, dealing bonus execute damage at the end of the duration.

E: Reap
Cooldown: 10/9/8/7/6
Fiddlesticks slashes an area with its scythe, slowing all enemies hit and silencing enemies hit in the center of the slash.

R: Crowstorm
Cooldown: 140/110/80
A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks, dealing damage per second to all enemy units in the area.

flashcards.question: What are Fiora's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Duelist's Dance
Fiora challenges nearby enemy Champions to dodge her. She calls out a direction from which she will try to strike. If she can complete her own challenge, she receives a small bonus and calls out a new direction.

Q: Lunge
Cooldown: 13/11.25/9.5/7.75/6
Fiora lunges in a direction and stabs a nearby enemy, dealing physical damage and applying on-hit effects.

W: Riposte
Cooldown: 24/22/20/18/16
Fiora parries all incoming damage and disables for a short time, then stabs in a direction. This stab slows the first enemy champion hit, or stuns them if Fiora blocked an immobilizing effect with this ability.

E: Bladework
Cooldown: 11/9.5/8/6.5/5
Fiora has increased attack speed for the next two attacks. The first attack slows the target, and the second attack will critically strike.

R: Grand Challenge
Cooldown: 110/90/70
Fiora reveals all four Vitals on an enemy champion and gains movement speed while near them. If Fiora hits all 4 Vitals or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, Fiora and her allies in the area are healed over the next few seconds.

flashcards.question: What are Fizz's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Nimble Fighter
Fizz can move through units and takes a flat amount of reduced damage from all sources

Q: Urchin Strike
Cooldown: 8/7.5/7/6.5/6
Fizz dashes through his target, dealing magic damage and applying on hit effects.

W: Seastone Trident
Cooldown: 7/6.5/6/5.5/5
Fizz's attacks bleed his enemies, dealing magic damage over several seconds. Fizz can empower his next attack to deal bonus damage and empower his further attacks for a short time.

E: Playful / Trickster
Cooldown: 16/14.5/13/11.5/10
Fizz hops into the air, landing gracefully upon his spear and becoming untargetable. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again before smashing back down.

R: Chum the Waters
Cooldown: 100/85/70
Fizz tosses a fish in a direction that attaches to any champion that touches it, slowing the target. After a short delay, a shark erupts from the ground, knocking up the target and knocking any nearby enemies aside. All enemies hit are dealt magic damage and slowed.

flashcards.question: What are Galio's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Colossal Smash
Every few seconds, Galio's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage in an area.

Q: Winds of War
Cooldown: 12/11.5/11/10.5/10
Galio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado that deals damage over time.

W: Shield of Durand
Cooldown: 18/17.5/17/16.5/16
Galio charges a defensive stance, moving slowly. Upon releasing the charge, Galio will taunt and damage nearby enemies.

E: Justice Punch
Cooldown: 12/11/10/9/8
Galio will briefly step back and charge, knocking up the first enemy champion he encounters.

R: Hero's Entrance
Cooldown: 200/180/160
Galio designates an ally's position as his landing spot, granting all allies in the area a magic shield. After a delay Galio smashes down location, knocking up nearby enemies.

flashcards.question: What are Gangplank's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Trial by Fire
Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.

Q: Parrrley
Cooldown: 5
Shoots target, plundering Gold for each enemy unit killed.

W: Remove Scurvy
Cooldown: 22/20/18/16/14
Eats citrus to cure crowd control effects and restore Health.

E: Powder Keg
Cooldown: 0
Gangplank uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them.

R: Cannon Barrage
Cooldown: 180/160/140
Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.

flashcards.question: What are Garen's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Perseverance
If Garen has not recently been struck by damage or enemy abilities, he regenerates a percentage of his total health each second.

Q: Decisive Strike
Cooldown: 8
Garen gains a burst of movement speed, breaking free of all slows affecting him. His next attack strikes a vital area of his foe, dealing bonus damage and silencing them.

W: Courage
Cooldown: 23/21/19/17/15
Garen passively increases his armor and magic resist by killing enemies. He may also activate this ability to give him a shield and tenacity for a brief moment followed by a lesser amount of damage reduction for a longer duration.

E: Judgment
Cooldown: 9
Garen rapidly spins his sword around his body, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies.

R: Demacian Justice
Cooldown: 120/100/80
Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to attempt to execute an enemy champion.

flashcards.question: What are Gnar's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Rage Gene While in combat Gnar generates Rage. At maximum Rage his next ability will transform him into Mega Gnar, granting increased survivability and access to new spells. Q: Boomerang Throw / Boulder Toss Cooldown: 20/17.5/15/12.5/10 Gnar throws a boomerang that damages and slows enemies it hits before returning to him. If he catches the boomerang its cooldown is reduced.

Mega Gnar instead throws a boulder that stops on the first unit hit, damaging and slowing everything nearby. It can then be picked up to reduce the cooldown. W: Hyper / Wallop Cooldown: 7 Gnar's attacks and spells hype him up, dealing bonus damage and granting him Movement Speed.

Mega Gnar is too enraged to be hyper and instead can rear up on his hind legs and smash down on the area in front of him, stunning enemies in an area. E: Hop / Crunch Cooldown: 22/19.5/17/14.5/12 Gnar leaps to a location and bounces off the head of any unit he lands on, traveling further.

Mega Gnar is too large to bounce and instead lands with earth-shattering force, dealing damage in an area around him. R: GNAR! Cooldown: 90/60/30 Mega Gnar throws everything around him in a chosen direction, dealing damage and slowing them. Any enemy that hits a wall is stunned and takes bonus damage.

flashcards.question: What are Gragas's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Happy Hour
Gragas periodically heals upon using a skill.

Q: Barrel Roll
Cooldown: 11/10/9/8/7
Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds. Enemies struck by the blast have their Movement Speed slowed.

W: Drunken Rage
Cooldown: 5
Gragas guzzles down brew from his cask for 1 second. After finishing, he becomes drunkenly empowered, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on his next basic attack and reducing damage received.

E: Body Slam
Cooldown: 16/15/14/13/12
Gragas charges to a location and collides with the first enemy unit he comes across, dealing damage to all nearby enemy units and stunning them.

R: Explosive Cask
Cooldown: 120/100/80
Gragas hurls his cask to a location, dealing damage and knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius.

flashcards.question: What are Graves's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: New Destiny
Graves' shotgun has some unique properties. He must reload when he runs out of ammo. Attacks fire 4 bullets, which cannot pass through units. Non-champions struck by multiple bullets are knocked back.

Q: End of the Line
Cooldown: 12/11/10/9/8
Graves fires an explosive shell that detonates after 2 seconds, or 0.2 seconds if it strikes terrain.

W: Smoke Screen
Cooldown: 26/24/22/20/18
Graves fires a smoke canister at the target area creating a cloud of smoke that reduces sight range. Enemies caught in the initial impact are dealt magic damage and have their movement speed reduced briefly.

E: Quickdraw
Cooldown: 16/15/14/13/12
Graves dashes forward gaining an Armor boost for several seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill and refreshes the resistance boost.

R: Collateral Damage
Cooldown: 120/90/60
Graves fires an explosive shell dealing heavy damage to the first champion it hits. After hitting a champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes dealing damage in a cone.

flashcards.question: What are Hecarim's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Warpath
Hecarim gains Attack Damage equal to a percentage of his bonus Movement Speed.

Q: Rampage
Cooldown: 4
Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies dealing physical damage. If Hecarim damages at least one enemy, he increases the damage and lowers the cooldown of subsequent Rampages.

W: Spirit of Dread
Cooldown: 22/21/20/19/18
Hecarim deals magic damage to nearby enemies for a short duration. Hecarim gains Health equal to a percentage of any damage those enemies suffer.

E: Devastating Charge
Cooldown: 20/19/18/17/16
Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed and can move through units for a short duration. His next attack knocks the target back and deals additional physical damage based on the distance he has traveled since activating the ability.

R: Onslaught of Shadows
Cooldown: 140/120/100
Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing magic damage in a line. Hecarim creates a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee in terror.

flashcards.question: What are Heimerdinger's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Hextech Affinity
Gain Movement Speed while near allied towers and turrets deployed by Heimerdinger.

Q: H-28 G Evolution Turret
Cooldown: 1
Heimerdinger lays down a rapid-fire cannon turret equipped with a secondary pass-through beam attack (turrets deal half damage to towers).

W: Hextech Micro-Rockets
Cooldown: 11/10/9/8/7
Heimerdinger fires long-range rockets that converge on his cursor.

E: CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade
Cooldown: 12
Heimerdinger lobs a grenade at a location, dealing damage to enemy units, as well as stunning anyone directly hit and slowing surrounding units.

R: UPGRADE!!!
Cooldown: 100/85/70
Heimerdinger invents an upgrade, causing his next spell to have increased effects.

flashcards.question: What are Illaoi's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Prophet of an Elder God
Illaoi and the <font color='#669900'>Vessels</font> she creates spawn Tentacles on nearby impassible terrain. Tentacles swing at spirits, <font color='#669900'>Vessels</font>, and victims of Illaoi's Harsh lesson. Tentacles deal physical damage to enemies hit, and will heal Illaoi if they damage a champion.

Q: Tentacle Smash
Cooldown: 10/9/8/7/6
Increases the damage dealt by Tentacles. When activated, Illaoi smashes down a Tentacle that deals physical damage.

W: Harsh Lesson
Cooldown: 4
Illaoi leaps to her target, dealing physical damage and causing nearby Tentacles to also swing at the target.

E: Test of Spirit
Cooldown: 16/15/14/13/12
Illaoi rips the spirit from a foe's body, forcing it to stand before her. Spirits echo a percentage of the damage they take to the original target. If killed, or if the target gets too far from the spirit, the target will become a <font color='#669900'>Vessel</font> and begin spawning Tentacles.

R: Leap of Faith
Cooldown: 120/95/70
Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. A Tentacle spawns for each enemy champion hit.

flashcards.question: What are Irelia's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Ionian Fervor
When Irelia strikes enemies with spells she gains stacking bonus Attack Speed. At maximum stacks she also gains bonus damage on hit.

Q: Bladesurge
Cooldown: 11/10/9/8/7
Irelia dashes forward to strike her target, healing herself. If the target is Marked or dies to Bladesurge, its cooldown refreshes.

W: Defiant Dance
Cooldown: 20/18/16/14/12
Irelia charges a strike that deals more damage as she charges. She takes reduced physical damage during the charge.

E: Flawless Duet
Cooldown: 18/16.5/15/13.5/12
Irelia sends out two blades which converge on each other. Enemies caught in between are damaged, stunned and Marked.

R: Vanguard's Edge
Cooldown: 140/120/100
Irelia fires a massive number of blades that explode outward upon hitting an enemy champion. Enemies hit by the blades are damaged and Marked. Afterwards the blades form a wall that will damage and slow enemies that walk through it.

flashcards.question: What are Ivern's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Friend of the Forest
Ivern cannot attack or be attacked by non-epic monsters. Ivern can create magical groves on jungle camps which grow over time. When the grove is fully grown, Ivern may free the monsters to receive gold and experience. After level 5 Ivern can share jungle buffs with allies.

Q: Rootcaller
Cooldown: 14/13/12/11/10
Ivern conjures a vine, dealing damage and rooting enemy targets hit. Ivern's allies can dash to the rooted target.

W: Brushmaker
Cooldown: 0.5
In brush, Ivern's attacks deal bonus magic damage. Ivern can activate this ability to create a patch of brush.

E: Triggerseed
Cooldown: 11/10/9/8/7
Ivern places a shield on an ally which explodes after a short duration slowing and damaging enemies.

R: Daisy!
Cooldown: 140/130/120
Ivern summons his Sentinel friend Daisy to fight with him. Daisy will send out a shockwave if she attacks the same champion three times in a row.

flashcards.question: What are Janna's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Tailwind Janna passively gains bonus Movement Speed, and nearby allied champions gain this bonus when moving toward her.

Additionally, Janna's basic attacks cause additional magic damage based on her bonus Movement Speed. Q: Howling Gale Cooldown: 12 By creating a localized change in pressure and temperature, Janna is able to create a small storm that grows in size with time. She can activate the spell again to release the storm. On release this storm will fly towards the direction it was cast in, dealing damage and knocking away any enemies in its path. W: Zephyr Cooldown: 8/7.5/7/6.5/6 Janna summons an air elemental that passively increases her Movement Speed and enables her to pass through units. She may also activate this ability to deal damage and slow an enemy's Movement Speed. The passive is lost while this ability is on cooldown. E: Eye Of The Storm Cooldown: 16/15/14/13/12 Janna conjures a defensive gale that shields an ally champion or turret from incoming damage and increases their Attack Damage. R: Monsoon Cooldown: 150/135/120 Janna surrounds herself in a magical storm, throwing enemies back. After the storm has settled, soothing winds heal nearby allies while the ability is active.

flashcards.question: What are Jarvan IV's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Martial Cadence
Jarvan's first basic attack on an enemy deals bonus physical damage based on their current Health. This effect cannot occur again on the same enemy for a few seconds.

Q: Dragon Strike
Cooldown: 10/9/8/7/6
Jarvan IV extends his lance, dealing physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path.

W: Golden Aegis
Cooldown: 12
Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.

E: Demacian Standard
Cooldown: 12
Jarvan IV carries the pride of Demacia, passively granting him bonus Attack Speed. Activating Demacian Standard allows Jarvan IV to place a Demacian flag that deals magic damage on impact and grants Attack Speed to nearby allied champions.

R: Cataclysm
Cooldown: 120/105/90
Jarvan IV heroically leaps into battle at a target with such force that he terraforms the surrounding area to create an arena around them. Nearby enemies are damaged at the moment of impact.

flashcards.question: What are Jax's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Relentless Assault
Jax's consecutive basic attacks continuously increase his Attack Speed.

Q: Leap Strike
Cooldown: 8/7.5/7/6.5/6
Jax leaps toward a unit. If they are an enemy, he strikes them with his weapon.

W: Empower
Cooldown: 7/6/5/4/3
Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next attack to deal additional damage.

E: Counter Strike
Cooldown: 14/12.5/11/9.5/8
Jax's combat prowess allows him to dodge all incoming attacks for a short duration and then quickly counterattack, stunning all surrounding enemies.

R: Grandmaster's Might
Cooldown: 80
Every third consecutive attack deals additional Magic Damage. Additionally, Jax can activate this ability to strengthen his resolve, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist for a short duration.

flashcards.question: What are Jayce's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Hextech Capacitor When Jayce swaps weapons he gains movement speed for a short duration. Q: To the Skies! / Shock Blast Cooldown: 16/14/12/10/8/6 Hammer Stance: Leaps to an enemy dealing physical damage and slowing enemies.

Cannon Stance: Fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy (or reaching the end of its path) dealing physical damage to all enemies hit. W: Lightning Field / Hyper Charge Cooldown: 10 Hammer Stance: Passive: Restores Mana per strike. Active: Creates a field of lightning damaging nearby enemies for several seconds.

Cannon Stance: Gains a burst of energy, increasing Attack Speed to maximum for several attacks. E: Thundering Blow / Acceleration Gate Cooldown: 20/18/16/14/12/10 Hammer Stance: Deals magic damage to an enemy and knocks them back a short distance.

Cannon Stance: Deploys an Acceleration Gate increasing the Movement Speed of all allied champions who pass through it. If Shock Blast is fired through the gate the missile speed, range, and damage will increase. R: Mercury Cannon / Mercury Hammer Cooldown: 6 Hammer Stance: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and increased range. The first attack in this form reduces the target's Armor and Magic Resist.

Cannon Stance: Transforms the Mercury Cannon into the Mercury Hammer gaining new abilities and increasing Armor and Magic Resist. The first attack in this form deals additional magic damage.

flashcards.question: What are Jhin's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Whisper Jhin's hand cannon, Whisper, is a precise instrument designed to deal superior damage. It fires at a fixed rate and carries only four shots. Jhin imbues the final bullet with dark magics to critically strike and deal bonus execute damage. Whenever Whisper crits, it inspires Jhin with a burst of movement speed. Q: Dancing Grenade Cooldown: 7/6.5/6/5.5/5 Jhin launches a magical cartridge at an enemy. It can hit up to four targets and gains damage each time it kills. W: Deadly Flourish Cooldown: 12 Jhin brandishes his cane, firing a single shot with incredible range. It pierces through minions and monsters, but stops on the first champion hit. If the target was recently struck by Jhin's allies, lotus traps, or damaged by Jhin, they are rooted. E: Captive Audience Cooldown: 2 Jhin places an invisible lotus trap that blooms when walked over. It slows nearby enemies before dealing damage with an explosion of serrated petals.

Beauty in Death - When Jhin kills an enemy champion, a lotus trap will bloom near their corpse. R: Curtain Call Cooldown: 120/105/90 Jhin channels, transforming Whisper into a shoulder-mounted mega-cannon. It is able to fire 4 super shots at extreme range that pierce through minions and monsters, but stop on the first champion impacted. Whisper cripples enemies hit, which slows them and deals execute damage. The 4th shot is perfectly crafted, epically powerful, and guaranteed to critically strike.

flashcards.question: What are Jinx's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Get Excited!
Jinx receives massively increased Movement Speed and Attack Speed whenever she helps kill or destroy an enemy champions epic jungle monster, or structure.

Q: Switcheroo!
Cooldown: 0.9
Jinx modifies her basic attacks by swapping between Pow-Pow, her minigun and Fishbones, her rocket launcher. Attacks with Pow-Pow grant Attack Speed, while attacks with Fishbones deal area of effect damage, gain increased range, but drain Mana and attack slower.

W: Zap!
Cooldown: 8/7/6/5/4
Jinx uses Zapper, her shock pistol, to fire a blast that deals damage to the first enemy hit, slowing and revealing it.

E: Flame Chompers!
Cooldown: 24/20.5/17/13.5/10
Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place.

R: Super Mega Death Rocket!
Cooldown: 90/75/60
Jinx fires a super rocket across the map that gains damage as it travels. The rocket will explode upon colliding with an enemy champion, dealing damage to it and surrounding enemies based on their missing Health.

flashcards.question: What are Kai'Sa's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Second Skin Kai'Sa's basic attacks stack Plasma, dealing increasing bonus magic damage. Allies' immobilizing effects help stack Plasma. Additionally, Kai'Sa's item purchases upgrade her basic spells to have more powerful properties. Q: Icathian Rain Cooldown: 8/7.5/7/6.5/6 Kai'Sa shoots a swarm of missiles that seek out nearby targets.

Living Weapon: Icathian Rain is upgraded to shoot more missiles. W: Void Seeker Cooldown: 22/20/18/16/14 Kai'Sa shoots a long range missile, marking enemies with her passive.

Living Weapon: Void Seeker is upgraded to apply more passive marks and reduce cooldown on champion hit. E: Supercharge Cooldown: 16/15/14/13/12 Kai'Sa briefly increases her movement speed, then increases her attack speed.

Living Weapon: Supercharge is upgraded to briefly grant Invisibility. R: Killer Instinct Cooldown: 110/90/70 Kai'Sa dashes near an enemy champion.

flashcards.question: What are Kalista's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Martial Poise Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance when she launches her attack. Q: Pierce Cooldown: 8 Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills. W: Sentinel Cooldown: 30 Gain bonus damage when Kalista and her Oathsworn strike the same target.

Activate to send a soul to scout out the path, revealing the area in front of it. E: Rend Cooldown: 0 Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage. R: Fate's Call Cooldown: 150/120/90 Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to dash toward a position, knocking enemy champions back.

flashcards.question: What are Karma's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Gathering Fire Reduces Mantra's cooldown each time Karma damages an enemy champion with one of her abilities or basic attacks Q: Inner Flame Cooldown: 8/7.5/7/6.5/6 Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit.

Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay. W: Focused Resolve Cooldown: 12 Karma creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted and damaged again.

Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration. E: Inspire Cooldown: 10/9.5/9/8.5/8 Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the Movement Speed of the protected ally.

Mantra Bonus: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions. R: Mantra Cooldown: 40/38/36/34 Karma empowers her next ability to do an additional effect. Mantra is available at level 1 and does not require a skill point.

flashcards.question: What are Karthus's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Death Defied
Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells.

Q: Lay Waste
Cooldown: 0
Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Deals increased damage to isolated enemies. 

W: Wall of Pain
Cooldown: 15
Karthus creates a passable screen of leeching energy. Any enemy units that walk through the screen have their Movement Speed and Magic Resist reduced for a period.

E: Defile
Cooldown: 0.5
Karthus passively steals energy from his victims, gaining Mana on each kill. Alternatively, Karthus can surround himself in the souls of his prey, dealing damage to nearby enemies, but quickly draining his own Mana.

R: Requiem
Cooldown: 200/180/160
After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals damage to all enemy champions.

flashcards.question: What are Kassadin's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Void Stone
Kassadin takes reduced magic damage and ignores unit collision.

Q: Null Sphere
Cooldown: 11/10.5/10/9.5/9
Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at a target, dealing damage and interrupting channels. The excess energy forms around himself, granting a temporary shield that absorbs magic damage.

W: Nether Blade
Cooldown: 7
Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. Active: Kassadin's next basic attack deals significant bonus magic damage and restores Mana.

E: Force Pulse
Cooldown: 5
Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him.

R: Riftwalk
Cooldown: 5/3.5/2
Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cost additional Mana but also deal additional damage.

flashcards.question: What are Katarina's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Voracity Whenever an enemy champion dies that Katarina has damaged recently, her remaining ability cooldowns are dramatically reduced.

If Katarina picks up a Dagger, she uses it to slash through all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage. Q: Bouncing Blade Cooldown: 11/10/9/8/7 Katarina throws a Dagger at the target that then bounces to nearby enemies before ricocheting onto the ground. W: Preparation Cooldown: 15/14/13/12/11 Katarina gains a burst of movement speed, tossing a Dagger into the air directly above herself. E: Shunpo Cooldown: 14/12.5/11/9.5/8 Katarina blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise. R: Death Lotus Cooldown: 90/60/45 Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, dealing massive magic damage while she channels to the 3 nearest enemy champions.

flashcards.question: What are Kayle's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Divine Ascent Kayle's attacks are empowered by the heavens as she levels up and spends skill points. Her wings are lit aflame as she progressively gains Attack Speed, Movement Speed, Attack Range, and waves of fire on her attacks. Q: Radiant Blast Cooldown: 12/11/10/9/8 Kayle conjures a portal, summoning a celestial sword that pierces through enemies, slowing, damaging, and reducing the resistances of all hit. W: Celestial Blessing Cooldown: 15 Blessed by the divine, Kayle heals and grants movement speed to herself and the nearest ally. E: Starfire Spellblade Cooldown: 8/7.5/7/6.5/6 Passive: Kayle's celestial sword, Virtue, deals bonus magic damage to enemies she attacks.

Active: Kayle's next attack smites her target with celestial fire, dealing bonus damage proportionate to their missing health. R: Divine Judgment Cooldown: 160/120/80 Kayle makes an ally invulnerable and calls upon former Aspects of Justice to purify the area around her target with a holy rain of swords.

flashcards.question: What are Kayn's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: The Darkin Scythe Kayn wields an ancient weapon and fights Rhaast, the darkin within it, for control. Either the Darkin will triumph, or Kayn will master Rhaast and become the Shadow Assassin.

Darkin: Heal for a percentage of spell damage dealt to champions.

Shadow Assassin: For the first few seconds in combat with enemy champions, deal bonus damage. Q: Reaping Slash Cooldown: 7/6.5/6/5.5/5 Kayn dashes, then slashes. Both deal damage. W: Blade's Reach Cooldown: 13/12/11/10/9 Kayn damages and slows targets in a line. E: Shadow Step Cooldown: 21/19/17/15/13 Kayn can walk through terrain. R: Umbral Trespass Cooldown: 120/100/80 Kayn hides in an enemy's body, dealing massive damage when he bursts out.

flashcards.question: What are Kennen's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Mark of the Storm
Kennen stuns enemies he hits 3 times with his abilities.

Q: Thundering Shuriken
Cooldown: 8/7/6/5/4
Kennen throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.

W: Electrical Surge
Cooldown: 14/12/10/8/6
Kennen passively deals extra damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attacks, and he can activate this ability to damage and add another Mark of the Storm to targets who are already marked.

E: Lightning Rush
Cooldown: 10/9/8/7/6
Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units and apply a Mark of the Storm. Kennen gains movement speed when entering this form, and attack speed when leaving it.

R: Slicing Maelstrom
Cooldown: 120
Kennen summons a storm that strikes at nearby enemy champions for magical damage.

flashcards.question: What are Kha'Zix's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Unseen Threat Nearby enemies that are Isolated from their allies are marked. Kha'Zix's abilities have interactions with Isolated targets.

When Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow them for a few seconds. Q: Taste Their Fear Cooldown: 4 Deals physical damage to the target. Damage increased on Isolated targets. If he chooses to Evolve Reaper Claws, this refunds a percent of it's cooldown against Isolated targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear. W: Void Spike Cooldown: 9 Kha'Zix fires exploding spikes that deal physical damage to enemies hit. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to Evolve Spike Racks, Void Spike now fires three spikes in a cone, slow enemies hit, and reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Isolated targets are slowed for extra. E: Leap Cooldown: 20/18/16/14/12 Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to Evolve Wings, Leap's range increases by 200 and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist. R: Void Assault Cooldown: 100/85/70 Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Kha'Zix becomes Invisible, triggering Unseen Threat and increasing Movement Speed. If he chooses to Evolve Adaptive Cloaking, Void Assault gains increased Invisibility duration, and an additional use.

flashcards.question: What are Kindred's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Mark of the Kindred
Kindred can mark targets to Hunt. Successfully completing a Hunt permanently empowers Kindred's basic abilities. Every 4 hunts completed also increases Kindred's basic attack range.

Q: Dance of Arrows
Cooldown: 9
Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.

W: Wolf's Frenzy
Cooldown: 18/17/16/15/14
Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him.  Lamb passively gains stacks by moving and attacking. When fully charged, Lamb's next attack restores health.

E: Mounting Dread
Cooldown: 16/15/14/13/12
Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.

R: Lamb's Respite
Cooldown: 180/150/120
Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed.

flashcards.question: What are Kled's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Skaarl, the Cowardly Lizard Kled rides his trusty steed, Skaarl, who takes damage for him. When Skaarl's health depletes, Kled dismounts.

While dismounted, Kled's abilities change and he deals less damage to champions. Kled can restore Skaarl's courage by fighting enemies. At maximum courage, Kled remounts with a portion of Skaarl's health. Q: Bear Trap on a Rope Cooldown: 11/10/9/8/7 Kled throws a bear trap that damages and hooks an enemy champion. If shackled for a short duration, the target takes additional physical damage and is yanked toward Kled.

When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage. W: Violent Tendencies Cooldown: 14/12.5/11/9.5/8 Kled gains massive attack speed for four attacks. The fourth attack deals more damage. E: Jousting Cooldown: 14/13/12/11/10 Kled dashes, dealing physical damage and gaining a short burst of speed. Kled can cast this ability again to dash back through his initial target, dealing the same damage. R: Chaaaaaaaarge!!! Cooldown: 160/140/120 Kled and Skaarl charge to a location, leaving a speed-granting trail behind them and gaining a shield. Skaarl locks onto and rams the first enemy champion encountered.

flashcards.question: What are Kog'Maw's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Icathian Surprise
4 seconds after dying, Kogmaw explodes, dealing true damage to surrounding enemies.

Q: Caustic Spittle
Cooldown: 8
Kog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time. Kog'Maw also gains additional attack speed.

W: Bio-Arcane Barrage
Cooldown: 17
Kog'Maw's attacks gain range and deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage.

E: Void Ooze
Cooldown: 12
Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.

R: Living Artillery
Cooldown: 2/1.5/1
Kog'Maw fires an artillery shell at a great distance dealing magic damage (increased significantly on low health enemies) and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana.

flashcards.question: What are LeBlanc's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Mirror Image
When LeBlanc drops below 40% health, she becomes invisible for 1 second and creates a Mirror Image that deals no damage and lasts for up to 8 seconds.

Q: Sigil of Malice
Cooldown: 6
LeBlanc projects a sigil, dealing damage and marking the target for 3.5 seconds. Damaging the marked target with an ability detonates the sigil, dealing additional damage.

W: Distortion
Cooldown: 18/16/14/12/10
LeBlanc dashes to a location, dealing damage to enemies near her destination. For the next 4 seconds, activate Distortion again to return LeBlanc to her starting location.

E: Ethereal Chains
Cooldown: 14/13.25/12.5/11.75/11
LeBlanc launches a chain that shackles the first enemy hit. If the target remains shackled for 1.5 seconds, LeBlanc roots them and deals additional damage.

R: Mimic
Cooldown: 60/45/30
LeBlanc casts a mimicked version of one of her basic spells.

flashcards.question: What are Lee Sin's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Flurry After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain Attack Speed and return Energy. Q: Sonic Wave / Resonating Strike Cooldown: 10/9/8/7/6 Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.
Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing physical damage based on the target's missing Health. W: Safeguard / Iron Will Cooldown: 12 Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally, shielding himself from damage. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 3 seconds.
Iron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. For 4 seconds, Lee Sin gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp. E: Tempest / Cripple Cooldown: 10 Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast cripple for the next 3 seconds.
Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies damaged by Tempest, reducing their Movement Speed for 4 seconds. Movement Speed recovers gradually over the duration. R: Dragon's Rage Cooldown: 110/85/60 Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back, dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.

flashcards.question: What are Leona's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Sunlight
Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 1.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight to deal additional magic damage.

Q: Shield of Daybreak
Cooldown: 5
Leona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target.

W: Eclipse
Cooldown: 14/13/12/11/10
Leona raises her shield to gain Damage Reduction, Armor, and Magic Resist. When the duration first ends, if there are nearby enemies, she will deal magic damage to them and prolong the duration of the effect.

E: Zenith Blade
Cooldown: 12/10.5/9/7.5/6
Leona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and Leona will dash to them.

R: Solar Flare
Cooldown: 90/75/60
Leona calls down a beam of solar energy, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed.

flashcards.question: What are Lillia's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Dream-Laden Bough
Hitting a champion or monster with a skill will deal additional max Health damage over time.

Q: Blooming Blows
Cooldown: 4
Passively, Lillia gains stacking Move Speed when hitting enemies with spells. She can activate this to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, dealing extra true damage on the edge.

W: Watch Out! Eep!
Cooldown: 14/13/12/11/10
Lillia deals damage in a nearby area, dealing heavy damage in the center.

E: Swirlseed
Cooldown: 12
Lillia hurls a seed that damages and slows those it lands on. If it doesn't hit anything, it will continue rolling until it hits a wall or target.

R: Lilting Lullaby
Cooldown: 130/110/90
Lillia causes all enemies with Dream Dust on them to become Drowsy before falling asleep. Those enemies will take extra damage on being forcibly woken up.

flashcards.question: What are Lissandra's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Iceborn Subjugation
When an enemy champion dies near Lissandra they become a Frozen Thrall. Frozen Thralls slow nearby enemies and then, after a delay, shatter from the intense cold, dealing magic damage to nearby targets.

Q: Ice Shard
Cooldown: 8/7/6/5/4
Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing Movement Speed. Shards pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.

W: Ring of Frost
Cooldown: 14/13/12/11/10
Freezes nearby enemies in ice, dealing magic damage and rooting them.

E: Glacial Path
Cooldown: 24/21/18/15/12
Lissandra creates an ice claw that deals magic damage. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.

R: Frozen Tomb
Cooldown: 120/100/80
If cast on an enemy champion, the target is frozen solid, stunning it. If cast on Lissandra, she encases herself in dark ice, healing herself while becoming untargetable and invulnerable. Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing magic damage to enemies and slowing Movement Speed.

flashcards.question: What are Lucian's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Lightslinger
Whenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot.

Q: Piercing Light
Cooldown: 9/8/7/6/5
Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.

W: Ardent Blaze
Cooldown: 14/13/12/11/10
Lucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking and briefly revealing enemies. Lucian gains Movement Speed for attacking marked enemies.

E: Relentless Pursuit
Cooldown: 22/20/18/16/14
Lucian quickly dashes a short distance. Lightslinger attacks reduce Relentless Pursuit's cooldown.

R: The Culling
Cooldown: 110/100/90
Lucian unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons.

flashcards.question: What are Lulu's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Pix, Faerie Companion
Pix fires magical bolts of energy whenever the champion he's following attacks another enemy unit. These bolts are homing, but can be intercepted by other units.

Q: Glitterlance
Cooldown: 7
Pix and Lulu each fire a bolt of magical energy that damages and heavily slows all enemies it hits.

W: Whimsy
Cooldown: 16/15/14/13/12
If cast on an ally, grants them Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short time. If cast on an enemy, turns them into an adorable critter that can't attack or cast spells.

E: Help, Pix!
Cooldown: 8
If cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally and shield them. He then follows them and aids their attacks. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy and damage them. He then follows them and grants you vision of that enemy.

R: Wild Growth
Cooldown: 110/95/80
Lulu enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.

flashcards.question: What are Lux's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Illumination
Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for 6 seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.

Q: Light Binding
Cooldown: 11/10.5/10/9.5/9
Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units.

W: Prismatic Barrier
Cooldown: 14/13/12/11/10
Lux throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.

E: Lucent Singularity
Cooldown: 10/9.5/9/8.5/8
Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.

R: Final Spark
Cooldown: 80/60/40
After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.

flashcards.question: What are Malphite's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Granite Shield
Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for a few seconds, this effect recharges.

Q: Seismic Shard
Cooldown: 8
Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

W: Thunderclap
Cooldown: 12
Malphite attacks with such force that it creates a sonic boom. For the next few seconds, his attacks create aftershocks in front of him.

E: Ground Slam
Cooldown: 7
Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration.

R: Unstoppable Force
Cooldown: 130/105/80
Malphite launches himself to a location at high speed, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.

flashcards.question: What are Malzahar's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Void Shift When he hasn't recently taken damage or been crowd controlled, Malzahar gains massive damage reduction and crowd control immunity, lingering for a short period after taking damage. Q: Call of the Void Cooldown: 6 Malzahar opens up two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal Magic Damage and silence enemy champions. W: Void Swarm Cooldown: 8 Malzahar summons Voidlings to attack nearby enemies. E: Malefic Visions Cooldown: 15/13/11/9/7 Malzahar infects his target's mind with cruel visions of their demise, dealing damage over time. Using Malzahar's other spells on the target will refresh the visions.

If the target dies while afflicted by the visions, they pass on to a nearby enemy unit and Malzahar gains Mana. Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units. R: Nether Grasp Cooldown: 140/110/80 Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion over a zone of damaging negative energy.

flashcards.question: What are Maokai's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Sap Magic
Maokai's basic attack also heals him on a moderate cooldown. Each time Maokai casts a spell or is struck by an enemy's spell, this cooldown is reduced.

Q: Bramble Smash
Cooldown: 8/7.25/6.5/5.75/5
Maokai knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them.

W: Twisted Advance
Cooldown: 13/12/11/10/9
Maokai contorts into a mass of moving roots, becoming untargetable and dashing to the target. Upon arrival, he roots the target.

E: Sapling Toss
Cooldown: 10
Maokai flings a sapling to the target area to stand guard. More effective in brush.

R: Nature's Grasp
Cooldown: 120/100/80
Maokai summons a colossal wall of brambles and thorns that slowly advances forwards, damaging and rooting any enemies in the path.

flashcards.question: What are Master Yi's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Double Strike
Every few consecutive basic attack, Master Yi strikes twice.

Q: Alpha Strike
Cooldown: 18/17.5/17/16.5/16
Master Yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path, while simultaneously becoming untargetable. Alpha Strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to monsters. Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown.

W: Meditate
Cooldown: 28
Master Yi rejuvenates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health and taking reduced damage for a short time. In addition, Master Yi will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels.

E: Wuju Style
Cooldown: 18/17/16/15/14
Grants bonus true damage on basic attacks.

R: Highlander
Cooldown: 85
Master Yi moves with unparalleled agility, temporarily increasing his Movement and Attack Speeds as well as making him immune to all slowing effects. While active, Champion kills or assists extend Highlander's duration. Passively reduces cooldown for his other abilities on a kill or assist.

flashcards.question: What are Miss Fortune's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Love Tap
Miss Fortune deals bonus physical damage whenever she basic attacks a new target.

Q: Double Up
Cooldown: 7/6/5/4/3
Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them. Both strikes can also apply Love Tap.

W: Strut
Cooldown: 12
Miss Fortune passively gains Movement Speed when not attacked. This ability can be activated to grant bonus Attack Speed for a short duration. While it's on cooldown, Love Taps reduce the remaining cooldown of Strut.

E: Make It Rain
Cooldown: 18/16/14/12/10
Miss Fortune reveals an area with a flurry of bullets, dealing waves of damage to opponents and slowing them.

R: Bullet Time
Cooldown: 120/110/100
Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies. Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike

flashcards.question: What are Wukong's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Stone Skin Wukong gains stacking armor and max health regeneration while fighting champions and monsters. Q: Crushing Blow Cooldown: 9/8.5/8/7.5/7 Wukong's next attack gains attack range, deals bonus damage, and reduces the target's armor for a few seconds. W: Warrior Trickster Cooldown: 20/19/18/17/16 Wukong becomes Invisible and dashes in a direction, leaving behind a clone that will attack nearby enemies. E: Nimbus Strike Cooldown: 10/9.5/9/8.5/8 Wukong dashes to a targeted enemy and sends out images to attack enemies near his target, dealing damage to each enemy struck. R: Cyclone Cooldown: 120/105/90 Wukong's extends his staff and spins it around repeatedly, gaining Movement Speed.

Enemies struck take damage and are knocked up.

flashcards.question: What are Mordekaiser's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Darkness Rise
Mordekaiser gains a powerful damage aura and movement speed after landing 3 attacks or spells against champions.

Q: Obliterate
Cooldown: 9/7.75/6.5/5.25/4
Mordekaiser smashes the ground with his mace dealing damage to each enemy struck. Damage is increased when hitting a single enemy.

W: Indestructible
Cooldown: 14/13/12/11/10
Mordekaiser stores damage he deals and takes to create a shield. He may consume the shield to heal.

E: Death's Grasp
Cooldown: 22/19/16/13/10
Mordekaiser pulls all enemies in an area.

R: Realm of Death
Cooldown: 140/120/100
Mordekaiser drags his victim to a different dimension with him and steals a portion of their stats. If he kills them, he keeps the stats until the victim respawns.

flashcards.question: What are Morgana's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Soul Siphon
Morgana drains spirit from her enemies, healing as she deals damage to champions, large minions, and large monsters.

Q: Dark Binding
Cooldown: 10
Morgana binds an enemy in place with dark magic, forcing them to feel the pain they've caused and dealing magic damage. 

W: Tormented Shadow
Cooldown: 12
Morgana casts a cursed shadow on an area, damaging enemies who dare stand in her dark circle. They receive magic damage over time, which increases the lower health they are.

E: Black Shield
Cooldown: 26/24/22/20/18
