Morgana anoints an ally with a protective barrier of starfire, which absorbs magical damage and disabling effects until it is broken.

R: Soul Shackles
Cooldown: 120/110/100
Morgana unleashes the full force of her Celestial power as she unbinds her wings and hovers above the ground. She lashes chains of dark pain onto nearby enemy champions, gaining movement speed towards them. The chains slow and deal initial damage and, after a delay, stun those who are unable to break them.

flashcards.question: What are Nami's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Surging Tides
When Nami's Abilities hit allied champions they gain Movement Speed for a short duration.

Q: Aqua Prison
Cooldown: 12/11/10/9/8
Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.

W: Ebb and Flow
Cooldown: 10
Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.

E: Tidecaller's Blessing
Cooldown: 11
Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks and spells deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.

R: Tidal Wave
Cooldown: 120/110/100
Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.

flashcards.question: What are Nasus's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Soul Eater
Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Life Steal.

Q: Siphoning Strike
Cooldown: 7.5/6.5/5.5/4.5/3.5
Nasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.

W: Wither
Cooldown: 15/14/13/12/11
Nasus ages an enemy champion, decelerating their Movement and Attack Speeds over time.

E: Spirit Fire
Cooldown: 12
Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, dealing damage and reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it.

R: Fury of the Sands
Cooldown: 120
Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, damages nearby enemies, has a reduced cooldown on Siphoning Strike, and gains bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.

flashcards.question: What are Nautilus's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Staggering Blow
Nautilus' first Attack against a target deals increased physical damage and roots them briefly.

Q: Dredge Line
Cooldown: 14/13/12/11/10
Nautilus hurls his anchor forward.  Colliding with an enemy pulls them and Nautilus together, dealing magic damage.  Colliding with terrain pulls Nautilus towards it.

W: Titan's Wrath
Cooldown: 12
Nautilus gains a temporary Shield.  While it persists, his Attacks deal damage over time to his target and surrounding enemies.

E: Riptide
Cooldown: 7/6.5/6/5.5/5
Nautilus creates three exploding waves around himself. Each explosion damages and slows enemies.

R: Depth Charge
Cooldown: 120/100/80
Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them.

flashcards.question: What are Neeko's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Inherent Glamour
Neeko can look like an ally champion. Taking damage from enemy Champions or casting damaging spells breaks the disguise.

Q: Blooming Burst
Cooldown: 7
Neeko throws a seed dealing magic damage. The seed blooms again on hitting champions or killing units.

W: Shapesplitter
Cooldown: 20/19/18/17/16
Neeko passively deals bonus magic damage every third attack. Neeko can activate to send a clone in a direction.

E: Tangle-Barbs
Cooldown: 12/11.5/11/10.5/10
Neeko slings a tangle that damage and root everything it passes through. If the tangle kills an enemy or passes through a champion, it becomes larger, faster, and roots for longer.

R: Pop Blossom
Cooldown: 90
After a short preparation, Neeko leaps into the air and gains a shield. Upon landing, nearby enemies are damaged and stunned. The preparation is hidden if Neeko is disguised.

flashcards.question: What are Nidalee's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Prowl Moving through brush increases Nidalee's Movement Speed by 10% for 2 seconds, increased to 30% toward visible enemy champions within 1400 range.

Hitting champions or monsters with Javelin Toss or Bushwhack triggers a Hunt, granting True Sight of them for 4 seconds. During this time, Nidalee gains 10% Movement Speed (increased to 30% toward the Hunted target) and her Takedown and Pounce are enhanced against them. Q: Javelin Toss / Takedown Cooldown: 6 In human form, Nidalee throws a spiked javelin at her target that gains damage as it flies. As a cougar, her next attack will attempt to fatally wound her target, dealing more damage the less life they have. W: Bushwhack / Pounce Cooldown: 13/12/11/10/9 In human form, Nidalee lays a trap for unwary opponents that, when sprung, damages and reveals its target. As a cougar, she jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands. E: Primal Surge / Swipe Cooldown: 12 In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration. As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her. R: Aspect Of The Cougar Cooldown: 3 Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities.

flashcards.question: What are Nocturne's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Umbra Blades Every few seconds, Nocturne's next attack strikes surrounding enemies for bonus physical damage and heals himself.

Nocturne's basic attacks reduce this cooldown. Q: Duskbringer Cooldown: 8 Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals damage, leaves a Dusk Trail, and causes champions to leave a Dusk Trail. While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and has increased Movement Speed and Attack Damage. W: Shroud of Darkness Cooldown: 20/18/16/14/12 Nocturne empowers his blades, passively gaining Attack Speed. Activating Shroud of Darkness allows Nocturne to fade into the shadows, creating a magical barrier which blocks a single enemy ability and doubles his passive Attack Speed if successful. E: Unspeakable Horror Cooldown: 15/14/13/12/11 Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing damage each second and applying fear to the target if they do not get out of range by the end of the duration. R: Paranoia Cooldown: 140/115/90 Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision in the process. He can then launch himself at a nearby enemy champion.

flashcards.question: What are Nunu & Willump's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Call of the Freljord
Nunu increases the attack speed and movement speed of Willump and a nearby ally, and causes Willump's basic attacks to damage enemies around the target.

Q: Consume
Cooldown: 12/11/10/9/8
Willump takes a bite out of a minion, monster, or enemy champion, dealing damage and healing himself.

W: Biggest Snowball Ever!
Cooldown: 14
Willump creates a snowball that grows in size and speed as he rolls it.  The snowball damages and knocks up enemies.

E: Snowball Barrage
Cooldown: 14
Nunu throws multiple snowballs that damage enemies.  When he's finished, Willump roots any champions or large monsters that were hit by a snowball.

R: Absolute Zero
Cooldown: 110/100/90
Nunu & Willump create a powerful blizzard in an area that slows enemies and deals massive damage at the end.

flashcards.question: What are Olaf's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Berserker Rage
Olaf gains Attack Speed based on his missing Health.

Q: Undertow
Cooldown: 7
Olaf throws an axe into the ground at a target location, dealing damage to enemies it passes through and slowing their Move Speed. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.

W: Vicious Strikes
Cooldown: 16
Olaf's Attack Speed is increased, he gains Life Steal and has increased healing from all sources based on how much Health he is missing.

E: Reckless Swing
Cooldown: 11/10/9/8/7
Olaf attacks with such force that it deals true damage to his target and himself, refunding the Health cost if he destroys the target.

R: Ragnarok
Cooldown: 100/90/80
Olaf temporarily becomes immune to disables.

flashcards.question: What are Orianna's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Clockwork Windup
Orianna's Attacks deal additional magic damage. This damage increases the more Orianna Attacks the same target.

Q: Command: Attack
Cooldown: 6/5.25/4.5/3.75/3
Orianna commands her Ball to fire toward a target location, dealing magic damage to targets along the way (deals less damage to subsequent targets). Her Ball remains at the target location after.

W: Command: Dissonance
Cooldown: 7
Orianna commands her Ball to release a pulse of energy, dealing magic damage around it. This leaves a field behind that speeds up allies and slows enemies.

E: Command: Protect
Cooldown: 9
Orianna commands her Ball to attach to an allied champion, Shielding them and dealing magic damage to any enemies it passes through on the way. Additionally, the Ball grants additional Armor and Magic Resist to the champion it is attached to.

R: Command: Shockwave
Cooldown: 110/95/80
Orianna commands her Ball to unleash a shockwave, dealing magic damage and launching nearby enemies towards the Ball after a short delay.

flashcards.question: What are Ornn's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Living Forge Ornn gains an additional bonus Armor and Magic Resistance from all sources.

Ornn can spend gold to forge non-consumable items anywhere.

Additionally, he can create masterwork items for himself and for his allies. Q: Volcanic Rupture Cooldown: 9/8.5/8/7.5/7 Ornn slams the ground, sending out a fissure dealing damage and slowing enemies hit. After a small delay, a magma pillar forms at the end location. W: Bellows Breath Cooldown: 12/11.5/11/10.5/10 Ornn advances, breathing fire. Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle. E: Searing Charge Cooldown: 16/15/14/13/12 Ornn charges, dealing damage to enemies he passes through. If Ornn collides with terrain while charging, the impact creates a shockwave around him which deals damage and knocks up enemies. R: Call of the Forge God Cooldown: 140/120/100 Ornn summons a massive elemental at a location which travels toward him with increasing speed. Enemies run over by the elemental take damage, are slowed and are made Brittle. Ornn can recast the ability to charge into the elemental, redirecting it in the direction he hits it, causing the elemental to affect any enemies it runs over to be knocked up, dealing the same damage and re-applying Brittle.

flashcards.question: What are Pantheon's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Mortal Will
Every few spells or attacks, Pantheon's next spell is empowered.

Q: Comet Spear
Cooldown: 13/11.75/10.5/9.25/8
Pantheon either thrusts his spear or throws his spear in the chosen direction.

W: Shield Vault
Cooldown: 13/12/11/10/9
Pantheon dashes to a target, damaging and stunning them.

E: Aegis Assault
Cooldown: 22/20.5/19/17.5/16
Pantheon sets his shield, becoming invulnerable to damage from the front and striking repeatedly with his spear.

R: Grand Starfall
Cooldown: 180/165/150
Pantheon composes himself and then leaps into the air, landing at a chosen location as a comet.

flashcards.question: What are Poppy's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Iron Ambassador
Poppy throws her buckler that bounces off the target. Poppy can pick it up to gain a temporary shield.

Q: Hammer Shock
Cooldown: 8/7/6/5/4
Poppy swings her hammer, dealing damage and creating a zone that will slow enemies and explode after a delay.

W: Steadfast Presence
Cooldown: 24/22/20/18/16
Poppy passively gains Armor and Magic Resist. This bonus increases when she is low on Health. Poppy can activate Steadfast Presence to gain movement speed and stop enemy dashes around her. If a dash is stopped, the enemy is slowed and grounded.

E: Heroic Charge
Cooldown: 14/13/12/11/10
Poppy dashes to the target and pushes it back. If the target is pushed into a wall, it is stunned.

R: Keeper's Verdict
Cooldown: 140/120/100
Poppy channels a hammer strike that knocks enemies very far away.

flashcards.question: What are Pyke's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Gift of the Drowned Ones
When Pyke is hidden from enemies, he regenerates damage that he has recently taken from champions. Pyke also cannot gain extra Maximum Health from any source, and instead gains Bonus AD.

Q: Bone Skewer
Cooldown: 10/9.5/9/8.5/8
Pyke either stabs an enemy in front of him or pulls an enemy towards him.

W: Ghostwater Dive
Cooldown: 12/11.5/11/10.5/10
Pyke enters Camouflage and gains significant movement speed that decays over time.

E: Phantom Undertow
Cooldown: 15
Pyke dashes and leaves behind a phantom that will return to him, stunning enemy champions along its path.

R: Death From Below
Cooldown: 120/100/80
Pyke blinks to and executes low health enemies, allowing him to cast this spell again and granting additional gold to an ally who assists.

flashcards.question: What are Qiyana's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Royal Privilege
Qiyana's first basic attack or ability against each enemy deals bonus damage.

Q: Elemental Wrath / Edge of Ixtal
Cooldown: 7
Qiyana swings her weapon, dealing damage with a bonus effect based on her element.

W: Terrashape
Cooldown: 7
Qiyana dashes to a location and enchants her weapon with an element. Her attacks and abilities deal bonus damage while her weapon is enchanted. 

E: Audacity
Cooldown: 12/11/10/9/8
Qiyana dashes to an enemy, damaging them.

R: Supreme Display of Talent
Cooldown: 120
Qiyana sends out a shockwave that detonates whatever elements she hits with it, stunning and damaging nearby enemies.

flashcards.question: What are Quinn's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Harrier
Valor, Quinn's Demacian eagle, periodically marks enemies as <font color='#FFF673'>Vulnerable</font>. Quinn's first basic attack against <font color='#FFF673'>Vulnerable</font> targets will deal bonus physical damage.

Q: Blinding Assault
Cooldown: 11/10.5/10/9.5/9
Quinn calls Valor to mark an enemy and hinder its vision before damaging all enemies in the immediate area.

W: Heightened Senses
Cooldown: 50/45/40/35/30
Passively grants Quinn Attack Speed and Movement Speed after she attacks a <font color='#FFF673'>Vulnerable</font> target. Activate to have Valor reveal a large area nearby.

E: Vault
Cooldown: 12/11/10/9/8
Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing physical damage and slowing the target's Movement Speed. Upon reaching the target, she leaps off the target, briefly interrupting it, and lands near her maximum Attack Range away from the target.

R: Behind Enemy Lines
Cooldown: 3
Quinn and Valor team up to fly around at great speed.  Ending the ability casts Skystrike, which deals damage to nearby enemies and marks champions as Vulnerable.

flashcards.question: What are Rakan's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Fey Feathers
Rakan periodically gains a shield.

Q: Gleaming Quill
Cooldown: 0
Flings a magical feather that deals magic damage. Striking a champion or epic monster enables Rakan to heal his allies.

W: Grand Entrance
Cooldown: 18/16.5/15/13.5/12
Dashes to a location, knocking up nearby enemies on arrival.

E: Battle Dance
Cooldown: 0
Flies to an allied champion granting them a shield. Can be re-cast for free for a short duration.

R: The Quickness
Cooldown: 130/110/90
Gains movement speed, charming and dealing magic damage to enemies touched.

flashcards.question: What are Rammus's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Spiked Shell
Rammus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage, scaling with his Armor.

Q: Powerball
Cooldown: 16/13.5/11/8.5/6
Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.

W: Defensive Ball Curl
Cooldown: 6
Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, amplifying Spiked Shells' damage, and returning damage to enemies that basic attack him, but he is also slowed during this time.

E: Frenzying Taunt
Cooldown: 12
Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against him. Additionally, he gains increased Attack Speed for a short time, but this bonus is extended by having any of his other spells active.

R: Tremors
Cooldown: 100/80/60
Rammus creates waves of destruction pulsing through the ground, causing damage to nearby enemies and slowing them. Turrets take double damage from Tremors.

flashcards.question: What are Rek'Sai's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Fury of the Xer'Sai Rek'sai generates Fury by Attack and hitting with basic abilities. She consumes this Fury while Burrowed to restore health. Q: Queen's Wrath / Prey Seeker Cooldown: 4 Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that deals Physical Damage and reveals enemies hit. W: Burrow / Un-burrow Cooldown: 4 Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Movement Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies. E: Furious Bite / Tunnel Cooldown: 12 Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing double and True Damage if she has max Fury.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance. R: Void Rush Cooldown: 100/90/80 Rek'sai passively marks targets by damaging them. She can activate this ability to become briefly untargetable and lunge at a marked target for heavy damage based on their missing health.

flashcards.question: What are Rell's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Break the Mold Rell attacks slowly but steals her target's Armor and Magic Resist on hit, dealing bonus damage based on the amount stolen. Q: Shattering Strike Cooldown: 9/8/7/6/5 Rell thrusts her lance to deal magic damage to units in a line, breaking their Shields. The first unit hit additionally suffers Break the Mold's defense steal.

If Rell is bound to an ally with Attract and Repel, they both recover health for each enemy champion hit by this spell. W: Ferromancy: Crash Down Cooldown: 13 Passive: Rell gains additional movement speed while mounted and additional Armor and Magic Resist while armored.

Active: Rell changes forms, casting a different spell based on form.
  • Mounted: Rell crashes down in her armor, knocking enemies up and gaining a large shield.
  • Armored: Rell forms her mount, gaining a burst of speed and flipping the next enemy she attacks.
    • E: Attract and Repel Cooldown: 18/16.25/14.5/12.75/11 Rell binds a piece of her Armor to another allied champion to grant them Armor and Magic Resist while near.

    While she has an ally bound in this way, Rell can cast this ability without targeting an allied champion to snap the binding and Stun enemies caught in it. R: Magnet Storm Cooldown: 120/100/80 Rell explodes in a magnetic fury, violently Pulling nearby enemies towards herself. Then Rell constantly Drags nearby enemies towards herself for a short while, dealing magic damage over time.

flashcards.question: What are Renekton's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Reign of Anger
Renekton's attacks generate Fury, increased when he is low on life. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects.

Q: Cull the Meek
Cooldown: 8
Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.

W: Ruthless Predator
Cooldown: 13/12/11/10/9
Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, destroying damage shields on the target, dealing high physical damage, and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

E: Slice and Dice
Cooldown: 18/17/16/15/14
Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.

R: Dominus
Cooldown: 120
Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.

flashcards.question: What are Rengar's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Unseen Predator While in brush, Rengar leaps at his target with his basic attack. Leaping while at no Ferocity generates Ferocity.

At Max Ferocity, his next ability is empowered. Casting an empowered ability increases Rengar's Movement Speed for a few seconds.

Killing enemy champions awards trophies on Rengar's Bonetooth Necklace, granting bonus attack damage. Q: Savagery Cooldown: 0.25 Rengar's next attack brutally stabs his target for bonus damage.

Ferocity effect: deals increased damage and grants Attack Speed. W: Battle Roar Cooldown: 0.25 Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and healing for some of the recent damage he has taken.

Ferocity effect: additionally breaks crowd control effects. E: Bola Strike Cooldown: 0.25 Rengar throws a bola, slowing the first target hit for a short duration.

Ferocity effect: roots the target. R: Thrill of the Hunt Cooldown: 110/90/70 Rengar's predatory instincts take over, Camouflaging him and revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius around him. During Thrill of the Hunt, Rengar gains Movement Speed and he can leap to the tracked enemy without being in brush, reducing their armor.

flashcards.question: What are Riven's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Runic Blade
Riven's abilities charge her blade, and her basic attacks expend charges to deal an additional damage.

Q: Broken Wings
Cooldown: 13
Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.

W: Ki Burst
Cooldown: 11/10/9/8/7
Riven emits a Ki Burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.

E: Valor
Cooldown: 10/9/8/7/6
Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.

R: Blade of the Exile
Cooldown: 120/90/60
Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy, and gains Attack Damage and Range. During this time, she also gains the ability to use Wind Slash, a powerful ranged attack, once.

flashcards.question: What are Rumble's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Junkyard Titan
Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.

Q: Flamespitter
Cooldown: 10/9/8/7/6
Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.

W: Scrap Shield
Cooldown: 6
Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.

E: Electro Harpoon
Cooldown: 0.5
Rumble launches a harpoon, electrocuting his target with magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.

R: The Equalizer
Cooldown: 100/85/70
Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.

flashcards.question: What are Ryze's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Arcane Mastery Ryze's spells deal extra damage based on his Bonus Mana, and he gains a percentage increase to his maximum Mana based on his Ability Power. Q: Overload Cooldown: 6 Passively, Ryze's other basic abilities reset the cooldown of Overload and charge a rune. When Ryze casts Overload with 2 runes charged, he gains a brief burst of Movement Speed.

On cast, Ryze throws a charge of pure energy in a line, dealing damage to the first enemy struck. If the target has Flux on it, Overload deals extra damage and bounces to nearby enemies with Flux. W: Rune Prison Cooldown: 13/12/11/10/9 Ryze traps a target in a cage of runes, damaging them and slowing their movement. If the target has Flux on it, they are instead rooted. E: Spell Flux Cooldown: 3.25/3/2.75/2.5/2.25 Ryze releases an orb of pure magical power that damages an enemy and debuffs all nearby enemies. Ryze's spells have additional effects against the debuffed enemy. R: Realm Warp Cooldown: 210/180/150 Passively, Overload deals even more damage against targets with Flux.

On cast, Ryze creates a portal to a nearby location. After a few seconds, allies standing near the portal are teleported to the target location.

flashcards.question: What are Samira's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Daredevil Impulse
Samira builds a combo by hitting attacks or abilities unique from the previous hit. Samira's attacks in melee range deal additional magic damage. Samira's attacks against enemies affected by <status>Immobilizing</status> effects will dash her to her attack range. If the enemy is <status>Knocked Up</status>, she also keeps them <status>Knocked Up</status> briefly.

Q: Flair
Cooldown: 6/5/4/3/2
Samira fires a shot or swings her sword, dealing damage. If cast during Wild Rush, strike all enemies in her path upon completion.

W: Blade Whirl
Cooldown: 30/28/26/24/22
Samira slashes around her, damaging enemies and destroying enemy missiles.

E: Wild Rush
Cooldown: 20/18/16/14/12
Samira dashes through an enemy, slashing enemies she passes through and gaining Attack Speed. Killing an enemy champion refreshes this ability's cooldown.

R: Inferno Trigger
Cooldown: 8
Samira unleashes a torrent of shots from her weapons, wildly shooting all enemies surrounding her.

flashcards.question: What are Sejuani's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Fury of the North
After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage.  Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.

Q: Arctic Assault
Cooldown: 20/18/16/14/12
Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.

W: Winter's Wrath
Cooldown: 9/8/7/6/5
Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage and applying Frost stacks.

E: Permafrost
Cooldown: 1.5
Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.

R: Glacial Prison
Cooldown: 120/100/80
Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.

flashcards.question: What are Senna's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Absolution When units die near Senna, their souls are periodically trapped by the Black Mist. Senna can attack these souls to free them, absorbing the Mist that held them in death. Mist fuels her Relic Cannon's power with increased Attack Damage, Attack Range, and Critical Strike Chance.

Attacks from Senna's Relic Cannon take longer to fire, deals bonus damage , and briefly grant her a portion of her target's Movement Speed. Q: Piercing Darkness Cooldown: 15 From the twin barrels of her Relic Cannon, Senna fires a unified beam of light and shadow through a target, healing allies and damaging enemies. W: Last Embrace Cooldown: 11 Senna sends forth a wave of Black Mist. If it hits an enemy it latches onto them hungrily, rooting them and everything nearby after a brief delay. E: Curse of the Black Mist Cooldown: 26/24.5/23/21.5/20 Senna draws the Mist she has stored in her weapon into a storm around her, embracing darkness and becoming a wraith within. Allies who enter the area are camouflaged and also appear as wraiths as the Mist shrouds them. Wraiths gain increased movement speed, are unselectable, and hide their identities. R: Dawning Shadow Cooldown: 160/140/120 Senna calls upon the relic stones of fallen Sentinels, splitting her relic cannon into a holy array of shadow and light. She then fires a global beam that shields allies from harm, while damaging enemies caught in the center.

flashcards.question: What are Seraphine's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Stage Presence
Every third basic spell will cast twice from Seraphine. Additionally, casting spells near allies grants her bonus magic damage and range on her next basic attack.

Q: High Note
Cooldown: 10/8.75/7.5/6.25/5
Seraphine deals damage in an area.

W: Surround Sound
Cooldown: 26/25/24/23/22
Seraphine Shields and Hastes nearby allies. If she is already Shielded she will Heal nearby allies as well.

E: Beat Drop
Cooldown: 13/12/11/10/9
Seraphine deals damage and impairs the movement of enemies in a line.

R: Encore
Cooldown: 180/150/120
Seraphine deals damage and charms enemies hit, refreshing the range with every allied or enemy champion hit.

flashcards.question: What are Sett's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Pit Grit
Sett's basic attacks alternate between left and right punch. Right punch is slightly stronger and faster. Sett also hates losing, gaining additional health regeneration based off of his missing health.

Q: Knuckle Down
Cooldown: 9/8/7/6/5
Sett's next two attacks deal additional damage based off of the target's max health. Sett also gains movement speed while moving towards enemy champions.

W: Haymaker
Cooldown: 18/16.5/15/13.5/12
Sett passively stores damage he takes as Grit. On cast, Sett expends all stored Grit to gain a shield and punch an area, dealing true damage in the center and physical damage on the sides.

E: Facebreaker
Cooldown: 16/14.5/13/11.5/10
Sett pulls in all enemies on opposite sides of him, dealing damage and stunning them. If enemies were only on one side, they are slowed instead of stunned.

R: The Show Stopper
Cooldown: 120/100/80
Sett carries an enemy champion through the air and slams them into the ground, dealing damage and slowing all enemies near where they land.

flashcards.question: What are Shaco's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Backstab Shaco's basic attacks and Two-Shiv Poison deal additional damage when striking from behind. Q: Deceive Cooldown: 12/11.5/11/10.5/10 Shaco becomes Invisible and teleports to target location.

His first attack while Invisible is empowered, dealing bonus damage and critically striking if he attacks from behind. W: Jack In The Box Cooldown: 16 Shaco creates a hidden animated Jack-in-the-Box. When triggered, it will fear and attack nearby enemies. E: Two-Shiv Poison Cooldown: 8 Shaco's Shivs passively poison targets on hit, slowing their movement speed. He can throw his Shivs to deal damage and poison the target. The thrown Shiv deals bonus damage if the target is below 30% health. R: Hallucinate Cooldown: 100/90/80 Shaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack nearby enemies (Deals reduced damage to turrets). Upon death, it explodes, spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes and dealing damage to nearby enemies.

flashcards.question: What are Shen's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Ki Barrier
After casting a spell, Shen gets a shield. Affecting other champions reduces the cooldown of this effect.

Q: Twilight Assault
Cooldown: 8/7.25/6.5/5.75/5
Shen recalls his spirit blade to attack with it, dealing damage based on the target's max health. The attacks are greatly empowered if it collides with an enemy champion, and all collided enemies are slowed while running away from Shen.

W: Spirit's Refuge
Cooldown: 18/16.5/15/13.5/11
Attacks that would hit Shen or his allies near his spirit blade are blocked.

E: Shadow Dash
Cooldown: 18/16/14/12/10
Shen dashes in a direction, taunting enemies in his path.

R: Stand United
Cooldown: 200/180/160
Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.

flashcards.question: What are Shyvana's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Fury of the Dragonborn Shyvana deals bonus damage to dragons and gains Armor and Magic Resistance. As Shyvana and her allies slay more dragons, she gains more bonus Armor and Magic Resistance. Q: Twin Bite Cooldown: 9/8/7/6/5 Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front of Shyvana. W: Burnout Cooldown: 12 Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moving faster for 3 seconds, part of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active. The Movement Speed reduces over the duration of the spell. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout.

Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size. E: Flame Breath Cooldown: 12/11/10/9/8 Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage on-hit.

Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing bonus damage and scorching the earth for a short duration. R: Dragon's Descent Cooldown: 0 Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take damage and are knocked toward her target location.

Shyvana passively gains Fury per second and gains 2 Fury on basic attack.

flashcards.question: What are Singed's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Noxious Slipstream
Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of movement speed when passing them.

Q: Poison Trail
Cooldown: 0
Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.

W: Mega Adhesive
Cooldown: 17/16/15/14/13
Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.

E: Fling
Cooldown: 10
Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.

R: Insanity Potion
Cooldown: 120/110/100
Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats.

flashcards.question: What are Sion's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Glory in Death
After being killed, Sion will temporarily reanimate with rapidly decaying Health. His attacks become very rapid, heal him, and deal bonus damage based on his target's maximum Health.

Q: Decimating Smash
Cooldown: 10/9/8/7/6
Sion charges a powerful swing in an area in front of himself that will deal damage to enemies when released. If he charges for enough time, enemies hit by the swing will also be knocked up and stunned.

W: Soul Furnace
Cooldown: 15/14/13/12/11
Sion shields himself and can reactivate after 3 seconds to deal Magic Damage to enemies nearby. When Sion kills enemies, he passively gains maximum Health.

E: Roar of the Slayer
Cooldown: 12/11/10/9/8
Sion fires a short range shockwave that damages and slows and reduces the Armor of the first enemy hit. If the shockwave hits a minion or monster, it will be knocked back, damaging, slowing, and reducing the Armor of all enemies that it passes through.

R: Unstoppable Onslaught
Cooldown: 140/100/60
Sion charges in a direction, ramping up speed over time. He can steer his charge slightly with the mouse cursor location. When he collides with an enemy he deals damage and knocks them up based on the distance he has charged.

flashcards.question: What are Sivir's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Fleet of Foot
Sivir gains a short burst of Movement Speed when she attacks an enemy champion.

Q: Boomerang Blade
Cooldown: 7
Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.

W: Ricochet
Cooldown: 12/10.5/9/7.5/6
Sivir's next few basic attacks will bounce to nearby targets, dealing reduced damage to secondary targets.

E: Spell Shield
Cooldown: 22/19/16/13/10
Creates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives Mana back if a spell is blocked.

R: On The Hunt
Cooldown: 120/100/80
Sivir leads her allies in battle, granting them a surge Movement Speed for a period of time. Additionally passively grants Sivir bonus Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.

flashcards.question: What are Skarner's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Crystal Spires
Skarner's presence causes crystals to spawn in set locations around the map. Crystals can be captured by either team by standing close to them. When near crystals his team owns, Skarner gains movement speed, attack speed, and increased mana regeneration.

Q: Crystal Slash
Cooldown: 3.5/3.25/3/2.75/2.5
Skarner lashes out with his claws, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies and charging himself with Crystal Energy for several seconds if a unit is struck. If he casts Crystal Slash again while powered by Crystal Energy, he deals bonus magic damage.

W: Crystalline Exoskeleton
Cooldown: 13/12.5/12/11.5/11
Skarner gains a shield and has increased Movement Speed while the shield persists.

E: Fracture
Cooldown: 14/13.5/13/12.5/12
Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy which deals damage to enemies struck and slows them. Basic attacking these enemies within a short window will stun them.

R: Impale
Cooldown: 120/100/80
Skarner suppresses an enemy champion and deals damage to it. During this time, Skarner can move freely and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, the target will be dealt additional damage.

flashcards.question: What are Sona's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Power Chord
After 3 spell casts, Sona's next attack will deal bonus magic damage in addition to an additional effect based on what song Sona last activated.

Q: Hymn of Valor
Cooldown: 8
Sona plays the Hymn of Valor, sends out bolts of sound, dealing magic damage to two nearby enemies, prioritizing champions and monsters. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone bonus damage on their next attack against enemies.

W: Aria of Perseverance
Cooldown: 10
Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield.

E: Song of Celerity
Cooldown: 12
Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Movement Speed. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus Movement Speed.

R: Crescendo
Cooldown: 140/120/100
Sona plays her ultimate chord, stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them. Each rank reduces the base cooldown of Sona's basic abilities.

flashcards.question: What are Soraka's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Salvation
Soraka runs faster towards nearby low health allies.

Q: Starcall
Cooldown: 8/7/6/5/4
A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers Health.

W: Astral Infusion
Cooldown: 6/5/4/3/2
Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.

E: Equinox
Cooldown: 20/19/18/17/16
Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted.

R: Wish
Cooldown: 160/145/130
Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all friendly champions.

flashcards.question: What are Swain's abilities?
flashcards.answer: Passive: Ravenous Flock Swain's ravens collect Soul Fragments that heal him and permanently increase his maximum health. Swain can right-click an immobilized enemy champions to pull them closer to him, dealing damage and ripping out a Soul Fragment. Q: Death's Hand Cooldown: 9/7.5/6/4.5/3 Swain unleashes several bolts of eldritch power that pierce through enemies. Enemies hit take more damage for each bolt they are struck by. W: Vision of Empire Cooldown: 22/21/20/19/18 Swain opens a demon eye that deals damage and slows enemies. Champions hit are revealed and also grant Swain a Soul Fragment. E: Nevermove Cooldown: 10 Swain launches a wave of demonic power forward. It then returns to Swain and roots enemies it hits. R: Demonic Ascension Cooldown: 120 Swain transforms into a demon and drains health from nearby enemy champions, minions, and neutral monsters. Swain can cast Demonflare to decimate nearby enemies with a nova of soulfire, dealing damage equal to a portion of the health he drained and ending his transformation.

flashcards.question: What are Sylas's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Petricite Burst After casting a spell, Sylas stores a charge of Petricite Burst. Sylas's basic attacks will expend a charge and whirl his energized chains around him dealing bonus magic damage to enemies hit. While Sylas has a charge of Petricite Burst, he gains attack speed. Q: Chain Lash Cooldown: 10/9/8/7/6 Sylas lashes his chains out, intersecting at his targeted location dealing damage to and slowing enemies.

After a delay, magical energy explodes from the intersection point dealing damage. W: Kingslayer Cooldown: 13/11.5/10/8.5/7 Sylas lunges at an enemy with magical force dealing execute based damage and healing himself against enemy champions. E: Abscond / Abduct Cooldown: 14/13/12/11/10 Sylas dashes to a location. Sylas can recast the ability to throw his chains out, pulling himself to an enemy he hits. R: Hijack Cooldown: 100/70/40 Sylas steals the enemy's ultimate ability and can cast it freely.

flashcards.question: What are Syndra's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Transcendent Syndra's spells gain extra effects at max rank.

Dark Sphere: Bonus damage against champions.
Force of Will: Bonus true damage.
Scatter the Weak: Increased width.
Unleashed Power: Increased range. Q: Dark Sphere Cooldown: 4 Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers. W: Force of Will Cooldown: 12/11/10/9/8 Syndra picks up and throws a Dark Sphere or enemy minion dealing magic damage and slowing the Movement Speed of enemies. E: Scatter the Weak Cooldown: 18/17/16/15/14 Syndra knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned. R: Unleashed Power Cooldown: 120/100/80 Syndra bombards an enemy Champion with all of her Dark Spheres.

flashcards.question: What are Tahm Kench's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: An Acquired Taste
Tahm Kench puts the heft of his immense body behind his attacks and abilities, gaining extra damage based on his total health. Damaging enemy champions builds stacks of An Acquired Taste. At three stacks, he can use Devour on an enemy champion.

Q: Tongue Lash
Cooldown: 5
Tahm Kench lashes out with his tongue, damaging and slowing the first unit hit. This ability gains a stun after three stacks of An Acquired Taste.

W: Devour
Cooldown: 20
Tahm Kench devours a target, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage. He can spit devoured minions and monsters out as a skillshot that deals magic damage in an area upon impact.

E: Thick Skin
Cooldown: 3
Tahm Kench turns incoming damage into gray health. As gray health decays, Tahm Kench is healed for a percentage of the gray health amount. When activated, this ability turns all gray health into a shield.

R: Abyssal Voyage
Cooldown: 140/130/120
Tahm Kench teleports across the map, and he may bring one ally champion with him.

flashcards.question: What are Taliyah's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Rock Surfing
Taliyah gains movement speed near walls.

Q: Threaded Volley
Cooldown: 7/6/5/4/3
Taliyah throws a volley of missiles in a target direction, moving freely as she does. This works the ground below her. If Taliyah casts Threaded Volley on worked ground, she only throws one missile.

W: Seismic Shove
Cooldown: 16/15/14/13/12
Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within in a direction of her choosing.

E: Unraveled Earth
Cooldown: 16/14/12/10/8
Taliyah creates a slowing minefield that explodes if enemies dash through it or are pushed/pulled through it.

R: Weaver's Wall
Cooldown: 180/150/120
Taliyah creates a very long wall and then surfs it.

flashcards.question: What are Talon's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Blade's End
Talon's spells Wound champions and large monsters, stacking up to 3 times. When Talon attacks a champion with 3 stacks of Wound, they bleed for heavy damage over time.

Q: Noxian Diplomacy
Cooldown: 8/7.5/7/6.5/6
Talon stabs the target unit. If they are within melee range, this attack deals critical damage. If they are outside melee range, Talon will leap at his target before stabbing them. Talon refunds some health and cooldown if this ability kills the target.

W: Rake
Cooldown: 9/8.5/8/7.5/7
Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. The returning blades deal bonus damage and slow units hit.

E: Assassin's Path
Cooldown: 0
Talon vaults over any terrain or structure, up to a max distance. This ability has a low cooldown, but puts the used terrain on a long cooldown.

R: Shadow Assault
Cooldown: 100/80/60
Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes Invisible while gaining additional Movement Speed. When Talon emerges from Invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals physical damage to enemies hit by at least one blade.

flashcards.question: What are Taric's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Bravado Spellcasts empower Taric's next 2 basic attacks to deal bonus magic damage, reduce his spell cooldowns, and attack in quick succession. Q: Starlight's Touch Cooldown: 3 Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch. W: Bastion Cooldown: 15 Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion.

Actively shields an ally and grants them Bastion for as long as they remain near Taric. Taric's spells also cast off the ally with Bastion. E: Dazzle Cooldown: 17/16/15/14/13 Taric readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies. R: Cosmic Radiance Cooldown: 180/150/120 Pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions after a delay, making them invulnerable for a short duration.

flashcards.question: What are Teemo's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Guerrilla Warfare
If Teemo stands still and takes no actions for a short duration, he becomes Invisible indefinitely. If he's in brush, Teemo can enter and maintain his Invisibility while moving. After leaving Invisibility, Teemo gains the Element of Surprise, increasing his Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

Q: Blinding Dart
Cooldown: 8
Obscures an enemy's vision with a powerful venom, dealing damage to the target unit and blinding it for the duration.

W: Move Quick
Cooldown: 17
Teemo scampers around, passively increasing his Movement Speed until he is struck by an enemy champion or turret. Teemo can sprint to gain bonus Movement Speed that isn't stopped by being struck for a short time.

E: Toxic Shot
Cooldown: 0
Each of Teemo's attacks will poison the target, dealing damage on impact and each second after for 4 seconds.

R: Noxious Trap
Cooldown: 0.25
Teemo throws an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack. If an enemy steps on the trap, it will release a poisonous cloud, slowing enemies and damaging them over time. If Teemo throws a mushroom onto another mushroom it will bounce, gaining additional range.

flashcards.question: What are Thresh's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Damnation
Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.

Q: Death Sentence
Cooldown: 20/18/16/14/12
Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.

W: Dark Passage
Cooldown: 22/20.5/19/17.5/16
Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.

E: Flay
Cooldown: 9
Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.

R: The Box
Cooldown: 140/120/100
A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.

flashcards.question: What are Tristana's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Draw a Bead
Increases Tristana's Attack Range as she levels.

Q: Rapid Fire
Cooldown: 20/19/18/17/16
Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her Attack Speed for a short time.

W: Rocket Jump
Cooldown: 22/20/18/16/14
Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands.

E: Explosive Charge
Cooldown: 16/15.5/15/14.5/14
When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units.

R: Buster Shot
Cooldown: 120/110/100
Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals Magic Damage and knocks the target back. If the target is carrying the Explosive Charge bomb, the bomb detonation radius is doubled.

flashcards.question: What are Trundle's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: King's Tribute
When an enemy unit dies near Trundle, he heals for a percent of its maximum Health.

Q: Chomp
Cooldown: 3.5
Trundle bites his opponent, dealing damage, briefly slowing and sapping some of their Attack Damage.

W: Frozen Domain
Cooldown: 15/14/13/12/11
Trundle turns target location into his domain, gaining Attack Speed, Movement Speed, and increased healing from all sources while on it.

E: Pillar of Ice
Cooldown: 24/22/20/18/16
Trundle creates an ice pillar at target location, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units.

R: Subjugate
Cooldown: 120/100/80
Trundle immediately steals a percent of his target's Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. Over the next 4 seconds the amount of Health, Armor, and Magic Resistance stolen is doubled.

flashcards.question: What are Tryndamere's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Battle Fury
Tryndamere gains Fury for each attack, critical strike, and killing blow he makes. Fury passively increases his Critical Strike Chance and can be consumed with his Bloodlust spell.

Q: Bloodlust
Cooldown: 12
Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat, increasing his Attack Damage as he is more and more wounded. He can cast Bloodlust to consume his Fury and heal himself.

W: Mocking Shout
Cooldown: 14
Tryndamere lets out an insulting cry, decreasing surrounding champions' Attack Damage. Enemies with their backs turned to Tryndamere also have their Movement Speed reduced.

E: Spinning Slash
Cooldown: 12/11/10/9/8
Tryndamere slices toward a target unit, dealing damage to enemies in his path.

R: Undying Rage
Cooldown: 110/100/90
Tryndamere's lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he becomes.

flashcards.question: What are Twisted Fate's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Loaded Dice
Upon killing a unit, Twisted Fate rolls his 'lucky' dice receiving 1 to 6 bonus gold.

Q: Wild Cards
Cooldown: 6
Twisted Fate throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through.

W: Pick a Card
Cooldown: 8/7.5/7/6.5/6
Twisted Fate chooses a magic card from his deck, and uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects.

E: Stacked Deck
Cooldown: 0
Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals bonus damage. In addition, his Attack Speed is increased.

R: Destiny
Cooldown: 180/150/120
Twisted Fate predicts the fortunes of his foes, revealing all enemy champions and enabling the use of Gate, which teleports Twisted Fate to any target location in 1.5 seconds.

flashcards.question: What are Twitch's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Deadly Venom Twitch's basic attacks infect the target, dealing true damage each second. Q: Ambush Cooldown: 16 Twitch becomes Camouflaged for a short duration and gains Move Speed. When leaving Camouflage, Twitch gains Attack Speed for a short duration.

When an enemy champion with Deadly Venom dies, Ambush's cooldown is reset. W: Venom Cask Cooldown: 13/12/11/10/9 Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target. E: Contaminate Cooldown: 12/11/10/9/8 Twitch wreaks further havoc on poisoned enemies with a blast of his vile diseases. R: Spray and Pray Cooldown: 90 Twitch unleashes the full power of his crossbow, shooting bolts over a great distance that pierce all enemies caught in their path.

flashcards.question: What are Udyr's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Monkey's Agility
Udyr gains stacking Move Speed and Attack Speed after using an Ability. Udyr has four basic Abilities that he may use to swap between Stances. Changing Stances immediately ends both the passive and the on-hit portion of the previous Stance.

Q: Tiger Stance
Cooldown: 6
Tiger Stance: Activation - Udyr's Attack Speed is increased for a few seconds. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after will deal a high amount of damage over 2 seconds.

W: Turtle Stance
Cooldown: 6
Turtle Stance: Activation - Udyr gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after heals him for 2.5% of his maximum health.

E: Bear Stance
Cooldown: 6
Bear Stance: Activation - Udyr increases Movement Speed for a short duration. Persistent Effect - Udyr's basic attacks stun his target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target for several seconds.

R: Phoenix Stance
Cooldown: 6
Phoenix Stance: Activation - Udyr unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after engulfs enemies in front of him with flames.

flashcards.question: What are Urgot's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Echoing Flames
Urgot's basic attacks and Purge periodically trigger blasts of flame from his legs, dealing physical damage.

Q: Corrosive Charge
Cooldown: 12/11/10/9/8
Fires an explosive charge at the target location, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies caught in the explosion.

W: Purge
Cooldown: 12/9/6/3/0
Urgot slows himself while he unloads his weapon on nearby enemies. Prioritizes enemy champions Urgot has recently struck with other abilities and triggers Echoing Flames.

E: Disdain
Cooldown: 16/15.5/15/14.5/14
Urgot charges in a direction, shielding himself and trampling non-champion enemies. If he catches an enemy champion, he will stop and hurl them out of his way.

R: Fear Beyond Death
Cooldown: 100/85/70
Urgot fires a chem-drill that impales the first enemy champion hit. If that champion falls below a health threshold, Urgot judges them weak and can execute them.

flashcards.question: What are Varus's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Living Vengeance
On kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Speed. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.

Q: Piercing Arrow
Cooldown: 16/14.5/13/11.5/10
Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.

W: Blighted Quiver
Cooldown: 40
Passive: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health. Active: Varus empowers his next Piercing Arrow.

E: Hail of Arrows
Cooldown: 18/16/14/12/10
Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Movement Speed and reduces their self healing and regeneration.

R: Chain of Corruption
Cooldown: 100/80/60
Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact.

flashcards.question: What are Vayne's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Night Hunter
Vayne ruthlessly hunts evil-doers, gaining <speed>30 Move Speed</speed> when moving toward nearby enemy champions.

Q: Tumble
Cooldown: 4/3.5/3/2.5/2
Vayne tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack deals bonus damage.

W: Silver Bolts
Cooldown: 0
Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's max health as bonus true damage.

E: Condemn
Cooldown: 20/18/16/14/12
Vayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back, and fires a huge bolt at her target, knocking them back and dealing damage. If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.

R: Final Hour
Cooldown: 100/85/70
Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, Invisibility during Tumble, reduced Tumble cooldown, and more bonus Movement Speed from Night Hunter

flashcards.question: What are Veigar's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Phenomenal Evil Power
Veigar is the greatest Evil to ever strike at the hearts of Runeterra - and he's only getting bigger! Striking an enemy Champion with a spell or scoring a takedown grants Veigar permanently increased Ability Power.

Q: Baleful Strike
Cooldown: 7/6.5/6/5.5/5
Veigar unleashes a bolt of dark energy that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit. Units killed by this bolt grant Veigar some ability power permanently.

W: Dark Matter
Cooldown: 0
Veigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location, dealing magic damage when it lands. Stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown.

E: Event Horizon
Cooldown: 18/16.5/15/13.5/12
Veigar twists the edges of space, creating a cage that Stuns enemies that pass through.

R: Primordial Burst
Cooldown: 120/90/60
Blasts target enemy champion, dealing a large amount of magic damage, increasing based on the target's missing health.

flashcards.question: What are Vel'Koz's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Organic Deconstruction
Vel'Koz's abilities apply <keywordName>Organic Deconstruction</keywordName> to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.

Q: Plasma Fission
Cooldown: 7
Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.

W: Void Rift
Cooldown: 1.5
Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.

E: Tectonic Disruption
Cooldown: 16/15/14/13/12
Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.

R: Life Form Disintegration Ray
Cooldown: 120/100/80
Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals magic damage. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead.

flashcards.question: What are Vi's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Blast Shield
Vi charges a shield over time. The shield can be activated by hitting an enemy with an ability.

Q: Vault Breaker
Cooldown: 12/10.5/9/7.5/6
Vi charges her gauntlets and unleashes a vault shattering punch, carrying her forward. Enemies she hits are knocked back and receive a stack of Denting Blows.

W: Denting Blows
Cooldown: 0
Vi's punches break her opponent's Armor, dealing bonus damage and granting her Attack Speed.

E: Excessive Force
Cooldown: 1
Vi's next attack blasts through her target, dealing damage to enemies behind it.

R: Assault and Battery
Cooldown: 120/100/80
Vi runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way. When she reaches her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, and slams it back into the ground.

flashcards.question: What are Viego's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Sovereign's Domination Enemies who fall before Viego become wraiths. By attacking a wraith, Viego temporarily seizes control of the dead enemy's body, healing for a percentage of his target's max health and gaining access to their basic abilities and items. He replaces their Ultimate with a free cast of his own. Q: Blade of the Ruined King Cooldown: 5/4.5/4/3.5/3 Viego's spectral blade passively deals bonus percent current health damage on-hit and strikes twice vs. enemies he recently hit with an ability, stealing health.

Viego can activate this abilty to thrust his zweihander forward, impaling enemies in front of him. W: Spectral Maw Cooldown: 8 Viego charges up before dashing forward, releasing a ball of concentrated Black Mist that stuns the first enemy hit. E: Harrowed Path Cooldown: 14/12/10/8/6 Viego commands the Black Mist to haunt and surround a piece of terrain. Viego can hide in the Mist as a wraith, gaining camouflage, movement speed, and attack speed. R: Heartbreaker Cooldown: 120/100/80 Viego teleports to a nearby location and executes an enemy champion on arrival, piercing their heart and causing a destructive shockwave around them that knocks away their allies.

flashcards.question: What are Viktor's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Glorious Evolution Viktor can augment his basic abilities when he gets kills on enemies. Q: Siphon Power Cooldown: 9/8/7/6/5 Viktor blasts an enemy unit dealing magic damage, gaining a shield and empowering his next basic attack.

Augment: Siphon Power's shield is increased by 60% and Viktor gains bonus Movement Speed after casting. W: Gravity Field Cooldown: 17/16/15/14/13 Viktor conjures a heavy gravitational field that slows enemies in its radius. Enemies who stay within the device for too long are stunned.

Augment: Viktor's non-periodic spells apply a slow to enemies. E: Death Ray Cooldown: 12/11/10/9/8 Viktor uses his robotic arm to fire a chaos beam that cuts across the field in a line, dealing damage to all enemies in its path.

Augment: An explosion follows the Death Ray's wake, dealing magic damage. R: Chaos Storm Cooldown: 120/100/80 Viktor conjures a singularity on the field which deals magic damage and interrupts enemy channels. The singularity then periodically does magic damage to all nearby enemies. Viktor can redirect the singularity.

Augment: The Chaos Storm moves 25% faster.

flashcards.question: What are Vladimir's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Crimson Pact
Every 40 points of bonus Health gives Vladimir 1 Ability Power and every 1 point of Ability Power gives Vladimir 1.4 bonus Health (does not stack with itself).

Q: Transfusion
Cooldown: 9/8/7/6/5
Vladimir steals life from the target enemy. When Vladimir's resource is full, Transfusion will benefit from massively increased damage and healing for a brief time.

W: Sanguine Pool
Cooldown: 28/25/22/19/16
Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood, becoming untargetable for 2 seconds. Additionally, enemies on the pool are slowed and Vladimir siphons life from them.

E: Tides of Blood
Cooldown: 13/11/9/7/5
Vladimir pays his own health to charge up a reservoir of blood which, when released, deals damage in the area around him but can be blocked by enemy units.

R: Hemoplague
Cooldown: 120
Vladimir infects an area with a virulent plague. Affected enemies take increased damage for the duration. After a few seconds, Hemoplague deals magic damage to infected enemies and heals Vladimir for each enemy Champion hit.

flashcards.question: What are Volibear's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: The Relentless Storm
Volibear's Attacks and abilities grant Attack Speed, and eventually cause his Attacks to deal bonus magic damage to nearby enemies.

Q: Thundering Smash
Cooldown: 14/13/12/11/10
Volibear gains speed towards enemies, <status>Stunning</status> and damaging the first one he Attacks.

W: Frenzied Maul
Cooldown: 5
Volibear damages an enemy, applying on-hit effects and marking them.  Casting this ability again on the same target deals bonus damage and Heals Volibear.

E: Sky Splitter
Cooldown: 15
Volibear summons a lightning bolt at a location, dealing damage and Slowing enemies while granting Volibear a Shield if he's inside the blast radius.

R: Stormbringer
Cooldown: 160/140/120
Volibear leaps to a target location, Slowing and damaging enemies beneath him while gaining bonus Health.  Enemy towers near his landing location become temporarily disabled.

flashcards.question: What are Warwick's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Eternal Hunger
Warwick's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. If Warwick is below 50% health, he heals the same amount. If Warwick is below 25% health, this healing triples.

Q: Jaws of the Beast
Cooldown: 6
Warwick lunges forward and bites his target, dealing damage based on their maximum health and healing for damage dealt.

W: Blood Hunt
Cooldown: 120/105/90/75/60
Warwick senses enemies below 50% health, gaining movement speed toward and attack speed against them. When they fall below 20% health, he frenzies and these bonuses triple.

E: Primal Howl
Cooldown: 15/14/13/12/11
Warwick gains damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end, or if re-activated, he howls, causing nearby enemies to flee for 1 second.

R: Infinite Duress
Cooldown: 110/90/70
Warwick leaps in a direction (scaling with his bonus movement speed), suppressing the first champion he collides with for 1.5 seconds.

flashcards.question: What are Xayah's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Clean Cuts
After using an ability, Xayah's next basic attacks will hit all targets along their path and leave a <font color='#C200E1'>Feather</font>.

Q: Double Daggers
Cooldown: 10/9/8/7/6
Xayah throws two damaging daggers that also drop Feathers she can recall.

W: Deadly Plumage
Cooldown: 20/19/18/17/16
Xayah creates a storm of blades that increase her basic attack speed and damage while granting her movement speed if she attacks a champion.

E: Bladecaller
Cooldown: 10/9.5/9/8.5/8
Xayah calls back all her dropped Feathers dealing damage and rooting enemies.

R: Featherstorm
Cooldown: 160/145/130
Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable and throwing out a fan of daggers, dropping Feathers she can recall.

flashcards.question: What are Xerath's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Mana Surge
Xerath's basic attacks periodically restore Mana.

Q: Arcanopulse
Cooldown: 9/8/7/6/5
Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.

W: Eye of Destruction
Cooldown: 14/13/12/11/10
Calls down a barrage of arcane energy, slowing and dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. Targets in the middle receive additional damage and a stronger slow.

E: Shocking Orb
Cooldown: 13/12.5/12/11.5/11
Deals magic damage to an enemy and stuns them.

R: Rite of the Arcane
Cooldown: 130/115/100
Xerath immobilizes himself and gains numerous long-range barrages.

flashcards.question: What are Xin Zhao's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Determination
Every third attack deals bonus damage and heals Xin Zhao.

Q: Three Talon Strike
Cooldown: 7/6.5/6/5.5/5
Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.

W: Wind Becomes Lightning
Cooldown: 12/11/10/9/8
Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward, slowing affected enemies.

E: Audacious Charge
Cooldown: 12
Xin Zhao charges to an enemy, dealing damage to all enemies in the area and slowing them briefly.

R: Crescent Guard
Cooldown: 120/110/100
Xin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back. Xin Zhao is impervious to damage dealt by champions outside of the circle created.

flashcards.question: What are Yasuo's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Way of the Wanderer Yasuo's Critical Strike Chance is increased. Additionally, Yasuo builds toward a shield whenever he is moving. The shield triggers when he takes damage from a champion or monster. Q: Steel Tempest Cooldown: 4 Thrusts forward, damaging all enemies in a line.

On hit, grants a stack of Gathering Storm for a few seconds. At 2 stacks, Steel Tempest fires a whirlwind that knocks Airborne.

Steel Tempest is treated as a basic attack and scales with all the same things. W: Wind Wall Cooldown: 30/27/24/21/18 Creates a moving wall that blocks all enemy projectiles for 4 seconds. E: Sweeping Blade Cooldown: 0.5/0.4/0.3/0.2/0.1 Dashes through target enemy, dealing magic damage. Each cast increases your next dash's base Damage, up to a max amount.

Cannot be re-cast on the same enemy for a few seconds.

If Steel Tempest is cast while dashing, it will strike as a circle. R: Last Breath Cooldown: 80/55/30 Blinks to an Airborne enemy champion, dealing physical damage and holding all Airborne enemies in the area in the air. Grants maximum Flow but resets all stacks of Gathering Storm.

For a moderate time afterwards, Yasuo's critical strikes gain significant Bonus Armor Penetration.

flashcards.question: What are Yone's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Way of the Hunter Yone deals magic damage with every second Attack. In addition, his critical strike chance is increased. Q: Mortal Steel Cooldown: 4 Thrusts forward, damaging all enemies in a line.

On hit, grants a stack of Gathering Storm for a few seconds. At 2 stacks, Mortal Steel dashes Yone forward with a gust of wind knocking enemies Airborne.

Mortal Steel is treated as a basic attack and scales with all the same things. W: Spirit Cleave Cooldown: 16 Cleaves forward, damaging all enemies in a cone. Grants a shield to Yone, the value is increased by the number of champions hit by the swipe.

Spirit Cleave's cooldown and cast time scale with attack speed. E: Soul Unbound Cooldown: 22/19/16/13/10 Yone's spirit leaves his body behind, gaining movement speed. When this skill ends, Yone's spirit is forced back to his body and he repeats a portion of the damage he dealt as a spirit. R: Fate Sealed Cooldown: 120/100/80 Yone blinks behind the last champion in a line with a slash so powerful it pulls all enemies hit towards him.

flashcards.question: What are Yorick's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Shepherd of Souls
<font color='#FF9900'>The Cursed Horde:</font> Yorick can summon Mist Walkers to swarm and attack nearby enemies.

Q: Last Rites
Cooldown: 7/6.25/5.5/4.75/4
Yorick deals bonus damage on his next attack and heals himself. If the target dies a grave will be dug.

W: Dark Procession
Cooldown: 20/18/16/14/12
Yorick summons a destructible wall at target location that will block enemy movement.

E: Mourning Mist
Cooldown: 12/11/10/9/8
Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that damages, slows and marks enemies.

R: Eulogy of the Isles
Cooldown: 160/130/100
Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes Yorick's attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.

flashcards.question: What are Yuumi's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Bop 'n' Block Periodically, when Yuumi attacks a champion, she restores mana and gains a shield that follows her, protecting her and the ally she's attached to. Q: Prowling Projectile Cooldown: 13.5/12/10.5/9/7.5/6 Yuumi fires a missile, dealing damage to the first target hit. It deals bonus damage and slows if it takes at least 1 second to get to its target.

While Attached, the missile can be controlled with your cursor. W: You and Me! Cooldown: 0 Passively, Yuumi increases her ally's Adaptive Force and her own. Actively, Yuumi dashes to a target ally, becoming untargetable from everything except turrets. E: Zoomies Cooldown: 12/11/10/9/8 Heals Yuumi and boosts Movement Speed and Attack Speed. If she's attached, she passes it to her ally instead.
R: Final Chapter Cooldown: 130/110/90 Yuumi channels seven waves of damage, rooting anyone hit by three or more. Yuumi can move, attach, and cast Zoomies! while channeling.

flashcards.question: What are Zac's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Cell Division
Each time Zac hits an enemy with an ability, he sheds a chunk of himself that can be reabsorbed to restore Health. Upon taking fatal damage, Zac splits into 4 bloblets that attempt to recombine. If any bloblets remain, he will revive with an amount of Health depending on the Health of the surviving bloblets. Each bloblet has a percentage of Zac's maximum Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. This ability has a 5 minute cooldown.

Q: Stretching Strikes
Cooldown: 15/13.5/12/10.5/9
Zac stretches an arm, grabbing an enemy. Attacking a different enemy will cause him to throw both targets towards each other.

W: Unstable Matter
Cooldown: 5
Zac explodes outward towards nearby enemies, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage.

E: Elastic Slingshot
Cooldown: 24/21/18/15/12
Zac attaches his arms to the ground and stretches back, launching himself forward.

R: Let's Bounce!
Cooldown: 130/115/100
Zac bounces four times, knocking up enemies hit and slowing them.

flashcards.question: What are Zed's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Contempt for the Weak Zed's basic attacks against low health targets deals bonus Magic Damage. This effect can only occur once every few seconds on the same target. Q: Razor Shuriken Cooldown: 6 Zed and his shadows throw their shurikens.

Each shuriken deals damage to every enemy hit. W: Living Shadow Cooldown: 20/18.5/17/15.5/14 Passive: Zed gains energy whenever he and his shadows strike an enemy with the same ability. Energy can only be gained once per cast ability.

Active: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for a few seconds. Reactivating Living Shadow will cause Zed to switch positions with this shadow. E: Shadow Slash Cooldown: 5/4.5/4/3.5/3 Zed and his shadows slash, dealing damage to nearby enemies. R: Death Mark Cooldown: 120/90/60 Zed becomes untargetable and dashes to an enemy champion, marking them. After 3 seconds the mark triggers, repeating a portion of all the damage Zed dealt to the target while they were marked.

flashcards.question: What are Ziggs's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Short Fuse
Periodically, Ziggs' next basic attack deals bonus magic damage. This cooldown is reduced whenever Ziggs uses an ability.

Q: Bouncing Bomb
Cooldown: 6/5.5/5/4.5/4
Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.

W: Satchel Charge
Cooldown: 20/18/16/14/12
Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after 4 seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage. Ziggs can use the Satchel to hexplode vulnerable enemy turrets.

E: Hexplosive Minefield
Cooldown: 16
Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing magic damage and slowing. Successive mine detonations on the same target deal reduced damage.

R: Mega Inferno Bomb
Cooldown: 120/95/70
Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take more damage than those farther away.

flashcards.question: What are Zilean's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Time In A Bottle
Zilean stores time as Experience and can grant it to his allies. When he has enough Experience to finish an ally's level up, he can right-click them to impart it. Zilean receives as much Experience as he gives.

Q: Time Bomb
Cooldown: 10/9.5/9/8.5/8
Tosses a bomb to target area that sticks to units that come near it (prioritizes Champions). It detonates after 3 seconds, dealing area of effect damage. If a Time Bomb is detonated early by another Time Bomb, it also stuns enemies.

W: Rewind
Cooldown: 14/12/10/8/6
Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of his other basic abilities.

E: Time Warp
Cooldown: 15
Zilean bends time around any unit, decreasing an enemy's Movement Speed or increasing an ally's Movement Speed for a short time.

R: Chronoshift
Cooldown: 120/90/60
Zilean places a protective time rune on an allied champion, teleporting the champion back in time if they take lethal damage.

flashcards.question: What are Zoe's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: More Sparkles!
Zoe's next basic attack after casting a spell deals bonus magic damage.

Q: Paddle Star!
Cooldown: 8.5/8/7.5/7/6.5
Zoe fires a missile that she can redirect in flight. Deals more damage the longer it flies in a straight line.

W: Spell Thief
Cooldown: 0.25
Zoe can pick up the remnants of enemy summoner spell and active item casts and cast them once herself. Whenever she casts a summoner spell, she gains 3 missiles that fire at the nearest target.

E: Sleepy Trouble Bubble
Cooldown: 20/18.5/17/15.5/14
Causes the target to become drowsy, then fall asleep. The first source of damage that breaks the sleep is doubled, up to a cap.

R: Portal Jump
Cooldown: 11/8/5
Blink to a nearby position for 1 second. Then blink back.

flashcards.question: What are Zyra's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Garden of Thorns
Seeds spawn around Zyra periodically, becoming faster with level. Zyra can cast Deadly Spines or Grasping Roots near seeds to grow plants, who fight for Zyra.

Q: Deadly Spines
Cooldown: 7/6.5/6/5.5/5
Thick vines spread through the ground and explode into spines, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area. If cast near a seed, Deadly Spines grows a Thorn Spitter plant, which fires at enemies from afar.

W: Rampant Growth
Cooldown: 0
Zyra plants a seed, lasting up to 60 seconds. Deadly Spines and Grasping Roots cast near seeds will turn them into plants who fight for Zyra. Zyra can store multiple seeds at once, and killing enemies reduces Rampant Growth's recharge time.

E: Grasping Roots
Cooldown: 12
Zyra sends forth vines through the ground to ensnare her target, dealing damage and rooting enemies they come across. If cast near a seed, Grasping Roots grows a Vine Lasher, whose short range attacks reduce enemy Movement Speed.

R: Stranglethorns
Cooldown: 110/100/90
Zyra summons a twisted thicket at her target location, dealing damage to enemies as it expands and knocking them airborne as it contracts. Plants within the thicket are enraged.

flashcards.question: What are Zyra's abilities?
flashcards.answer:
Passive: Garden of Thorns
Seeds spawn around Zyra periodically, becoming faster with level. Zyra can cast Deadly Spines or Grasping Roots near seeds to grow plants, who fight for Zyra.

Q: Deadly Spines
Cooldown: 7/6.5/6/5.5/5
Thick vines spread through the ground and explode into spines, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area. If cast near a seed, Deadly Spines grows a Thorn Spitter plant, which fires at enemies from afar.

W: Rampant Growth
Cooldown: 0
Zyra plants a seed, lasting up to 60 seconds. Deadly Spines and Grasping Roots cast near seeds will turn them into plants who fight for Zyra. Zyra can store multiple seeds at once, and killing enemies reduces Rampant Growth's recharge time.

E: Grasping Roots
Cooldown: 12
Zyra sends forth vines through the ground to ensnare her target, dealing damage and rooting enemies they come across. If cast near a seed, Grasping Roots grows a Vine Lasher, whose short range attacks reduce enemy Movement Speed.

R: Stranglethorns
Cooldown: 110/100/90
Zyra summons a twisted thicket at her target location, dealing damage to enemies as it expands and knocking them airborne as it contracts. Plants within the thicket are enraged.
